fields.Title: PIER / JOYCE INTRO
fields.Description:
Joyce is on her boat. She welcomes you and tells you about the situation, her role in it, what happened w hanged man.
1. Finishes task: find wild pines rep
2. Finishes task: reality lowdown
2. Gives task: investigate traffic jam
3. Volition white to get 130 real

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How about you share your informati..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How about you share your information on the lynching -- now that you've seen his badge."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay then."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm glad to see you here." Her gri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm glad to see you here." Her grip is tight and cold.
fields.Alternate1: "I'm glad to see you here." Her grip is tight and cold. She seems relieved.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course, detective -- take care.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course, detective -- take care."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But the strike began in *December*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But the strike began in *December*." He looks at his notes.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I believe the official title is Se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I believe the official title is Senior Labour Negotiator. In practice I'm a grocery clerk. I relay the Union's demands to Wild Pines, and return with Wild Pines' counter-offer..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Charmed, enchanted, put under his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Charmed, enchanted, put under his spell."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*Oh*. And what happened to yours,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Oh*. And what happened to yours, detective?" She returns the lieutenant's badge and turns to you.

fields.Title: You: ""Some artist types stole my badge...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some artist types stole my badge. It was a mistake to trust them."

fields.Title: You: ""Some damn *clown* stole it from me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some damn *clown* stole it from me. It's a long story."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Your synapses flash!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Your synapses flash!

fields.Title: Empathy: "There is no shame in her voice -- a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is no shame in her voice -- a touch of sadness, yes -- but no shame.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She takes a sip."
fields.Dialogue Text: She takes a sip.

fields.Title: Empathy: "The lieutenant is satisfied with wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is satisfied with where this is going.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""As they do.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "As they do."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Officer, I don't mean to be rude b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer, I don't mean to be rude but are you sure your recent medical episode wasn't a *stroke*?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "An opening gambit, surely."
fields.Dialogue Text: An opening gambit, surely.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's quite simple, you see. Every..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's quite simple, you see. Every time the Wild Pines Group makes a decision -- about, what? About *anything* really -- it needs the signature of *each* of the 2,200 workers in its Martinaise terminal."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "She enjoys talking about the compan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She enjoys talking about the company. It would not hurt to inquire more.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes, past a certain point numbers..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, past a certain point numbers begin to seem *imaginary*. But they are quite real for the 72,000 employees who depend on Wild Pines for their pay checks..."
fields.Alternate1: "I was not trying to impress you, I swear. The conglomerate employs 72,000 people, wages cover most of the revenue..." A wave hits the sloop, she looks at it indifferently.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""We built this district," she says,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We built this district," she says, calmly.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course not. Evrart is *fantasti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course not. Evrart is *fantastically* corrupt. I imagine he has a thick, viscous goo where you and I have blood."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's how they circumvent the term..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's how they circumvent the term limits, you see. With a funny little *switcharoo*. While in office they've embezzled god knows *how* much of their workers' dues."

fields.Title: You: ""That's Evrart, alright.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's Evrart, alright."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Organized labour at its best, as t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Organized labour at its best, as they say. Then something happened in the local chapter elections. The Brothers Claire came and transformed it into a... how do you say?" She hesitates, looking for the right expression.

fields.Title: You: ""One of those facts is where my bad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One of those facts is where my badge is."
fields.Alternate1: "One of those facts is where my badge is. Another is my name."

fields.Title: You: ""You have so much else. I have only..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You have so much else. I have only this." (Spread your hands) "This is the entirety of my existence."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't remember *anything* except..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't remember *anything* except this lynching. There is only this coast -- and this lynching."

fields.Title: Logic: "She wants you to help her gain leve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She wants you to help her gain leverage to re-start negotiations with the Union.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "She is resolute in this, yet you se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She is resolute in this, yet you sense that she *wants* to tell you. You'll have to earn her trust first.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Meth- and dextro-amphetamine, GBL..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Meth- and dextro-amphetamine, GBL and various synthetic psychedelics. Honestly, it might be quicker to say what you *can't* make from the stuff."

fields.Title: You: ""There will be an investigation, th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There will be an investigation, that's all I can say."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course, detectives," she says,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course, detectives," she says, her tone more cautious suddenly. "In any case, you've held up your end of our arrangement. I trust you with the rest. Now it's my turn..."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "You're thinking it, but your lips a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're thinking it, but your lips are not moving.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "A well-kempt, yet tastefully short..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A well-kempt, yet tastefully short bob of dark hair. Despite the first hints of grey, she's elected to keep it au naturale -- shaped into a permanent wave, late-Forties style...

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Surprisingly eloquent, really. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Surprisingly eloquent, really. The last one, not the first three -- those are ape-speak.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm the stuff people have under th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm the stuff people have under their fingernails. Let's talk about something else please."

fields.Title: You: ""You seem rich. Can I have some mon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You seem rich. Can I have some money?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "She's surprisingly nonchalant about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's surprisingly nonchalant about this. If anything, your finally asking it has relieved some of the tension.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""HOW MUCH MONEY?!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "HOW MUCH MONEY?!"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Come now. Nobody carries that much..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Come now. Nobody carries that much cash on their person, particularly in a place like Martinaise... I'd get robbed."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Well, technically speaking I'm not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, technically speaking I'm not *on* it right now..." She looks at the sloop sway in the waves.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Taking it out of commission will d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Taking it out of commission will deal a blow to the smuggling network. Excellent work."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""About the boat?" A wisp of steam r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "About the boat?" A wisp of steam rises from her thermal cup.

fields.Title: You: ""Old, huh? I think I have that too.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Old, huh? I think I have that too."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Sadly I need this one myself. It's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sadly I need this one myself. It's hydrophobic, repels water, almost *magically*. The company makes them for offshore platform personnel. Very sturdy."

fields.Title: You: ""One more thing -- you said somethi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One more thing -- you said something *happened* in the elections?"

fields.Title: You: ""Some kind of extortion probably.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some kind of extortion probably."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Because it was manufactured in Rev..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because it was manufactured in Revachol East by a company called Cor-de-Leite, and it's hull is '19 paces long."

fields.Title: You: ""Seems like they have no idea about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Seems like they have no idea about business."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Oh, but you are: too ashamed to ask..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, but you are: too ashamed to ask this person for *money*, too scared to belittle yourself in her eyes -- those half-precious stones of Eau-de-Nil.

fields.Title: You: ""Let me get this straight -- the ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let me get this straight -- the materials come from Samara to Revachol *through* the terminal?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Ludicrous, even, it's meant."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ludicrous, even, it's meant.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "This one's a slippery eel."
fields.Dialogue Text: This one's a slippery eel.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Then what is this positively desti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then what is this positively destitute *jetty* doing here?" She puts her foot down on the rotten planks beneath. "And what about that fleet of skiffs?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Leyton, my maiden name." Her bony..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Leyton, my maiden name." Her bony hand dangles from the sleeve of her oversized raincoat.

fields.Title: You: ""What can you tell me about this ly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What can you tell me about this lynching?"
fields.Alternate1: "Let's talk about the lynching."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And when did you first arrive?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And when did you first arrive?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course, ma'am. We should have i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course, ma'am. We should have introduced ourselves..." The lieutenant hands her a piece of blue plastic. "I'm Lieutenant Kitsuragi, from Precinct 57..."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, I thought Le Calliou was one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, I thought Le Calliou was one big island?"

fields.Title: You: ""There it is again -- the name of t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There it is again -- the name of that infernal machine! I woke up to that sound, you know?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""What a surprise," she says, not th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What a surprise," she says, not the least bit surprised. "That is one disadvantage of a motor carriage relative to a sloop like this one." The sloop bobs gently in the water.

fields.Title: You: ""Understood. About this boat of you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood. About this boat of yours..." (Back off.)

fields.Title: You: ""I'm pretty sure I do. I police.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm pretty sure I do. I police."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The other time I *would* have fini..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The other time I *would* have finished the race were it not for an urgent work matter, much like the one I'm on now."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The boat? No. *It* is called Cor-d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The boat? No. *It* is called Cor-de-Leite '19 -- because that's the type of sloop it is."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "It is a stable country, and yet the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It is a stable country, and yet there has always been something *ominous* about its perfect stability, its place at the edge of the Mundi isola, overlooking the Ubi Sunt? isles fracturing into the Great Unrest of the pale.

fields.Title: You: ""So I can't arbitrarily pull people..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I can't arbitrarily pull people over and ask for their papers?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Okay." She takes a sip."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay." She takes a sip.

fields.Title: You: ""Fuck it... Let's get back to work.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck it... Let's get back to work."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Such a tough guy." She gives you a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Such a tough guy." She gives you a crooked smile. "You have my full cooperation, tough guy -- and that of the Wild Pines Group."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait -- what if I want to hear abo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait -- what if I want to hear about *trade secrets*?"

fields.Title: You: ""An octopus? I will *slay* it!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "An octopus? I will *slay* it!"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""All the best parts of it. Rue de S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "All the best parts of it. Rue de Saint-Ghislaine with its bastions, the plaza's Meteoran mosaic. Even some of the old street lamps have been put back thanks to investments from the WP." She points behind you where the seawall rises.

fields.Title: You: ""A giant leech sucking the life out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A giant leech sucking the life out of Revachol."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ha!" She lets out a loud cackle. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ha!" She lets out a loud cackle. "I suppose you are, officer. *All*-Revachol. But enough about Evrart -- what else can I tell you about?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The situation is *extremely* volat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The situation is *extremely* volatile. The sooner we can speak about this lynching business, the better for all of us."

fields.Title: You: ""I'd rather not get into it, but ye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'd rather not get into it, but yes: a bunch of clowns -- and some *arlecchinos* -- stole my badge."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "*Feelings* will guide the way."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Feelings* will guide the way.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes, I believe there is a connecti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, I believe there is a connection -- but that's a subject for *later*." Her eyes narrow.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*Precisely*. Someone needs to move..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Precisely*. Someone needs to move the ingredients *from* the harbour into the city. Once they reach Jamrock they're distributed to a network of local manufacturers, well beyond our grasp. But in transit they are *vulnerable*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's true they drove a number of t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's true they drove a number of the local businesses to bankruptcy preparing for this venture. I've talked to a few business owners -- it was quite the shakedown. But the contents of a few cash registers cannot provide for *two thousand* men."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I wouldn't normally break protocol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wouldn't normally break protocol like this, but the situation demands it. If you don't solve this murder I'm afraid we may have a blood bath on our hands."

fields.Title: You: ""Why? How is you looking at the pho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why? How is you looking at the photo tied to the lynching?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes -- but please don't call me th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- but please don't call me that."

fields.Title: You: ""Help me, I'm poor. I need money to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Help me, I'm poor. I need money to keep living."

fields.Title: Logic: "She is memorizing your badge number..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She is memorizing your badge number.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""What is... speedfreaks FM?" She lo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is... speedfreaks FM?" She looks at you quizzically.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The *Ex-* something? The *Ex-* wha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The *Ex-* something? The *Ex-* what?"

fields.Title: Authority: "What is implied here?! That you're..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What is implied here?! That you're a *drunk*?!

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Matter of fact, I don't." She take..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Matter of fact, I don't." She takes another sip.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Don't worry. It's curable -- with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't worry. It's curable -- with *questions*. Ask me some, it'll help pass this night."

fields.Title: You: ""Like what?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like what?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Keep in mind, this is a negotiator..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Keep in mind, this is a negotiator Mr. Claire has worked with before, and who was more than fair with him and the Union."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The sooner the probe is finished t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The sooner the probe is finished the sooner I can share *crucial* information with you." She takes a sip of tea. "Now, is there anything I can do for you in the meanwhile? Tea, perhaps?"

fields.Title: You: ""I don't seem to have my badge, act..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't seem to have my badge, actually..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm afraid my partner doesn't shak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid my partner doesn't shake hands. Please don't take offence."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Heavens, no. There have been *two*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Heavens, no. There have been *two* prior strikes. Both times the Union won significant concessions -- including overtime pay *and* a medical plan. This time their demands are more... I guess you could say *aggressive*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The information I'm to share with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The information I'm to share with you includes sensitive trade secrets. For the sake of my employer, I have to ask for your name and badge number."
fields.Alternate1: "The information I'm to share with you includes sensitive trade secrets. For the sake of my employer, I have to ask for your names and badge numbers."

fields.Title: Logic: "She's referring to Lieutenant Kitsu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's referring to Lieutenant Kitsuragi's motor carriage.

fields.Title: You: ""More like the Anarchy Act in my op..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "More like the Anarchy Act in my opinion."

fields.Title: You: ""No need.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No need."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You may still ask to see my passpo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You may still ask to see my passport," she says, trying to strike a conciliatory tone. "*That* I'm obliged to share with you."

fields.Title: You: ""Let's talk about the *economics* o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's talk about the *economics* of this boat you're on." (Go in for the kill.)

fields.Title: You: ""This isn't gonna happen.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This isn't gonna happen."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Her concern is sincere, her eyes ro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her concern is sincere, her eyes round and affectionate.

fields.Title: Drama: "What situation?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What situation?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't worry. He'll be *fine*. It's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't worry. He'll be *fine*. It's all related to his unusual medical episode." He opens his notebook. "Continue, please. He has questions."

fields.Title: You: ""I have other questions.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have other questions."

fields.Title: You: ""You would be surprised at the amou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You would be surprised at the amount of damage I can inflict upon myself."

fields.Title: You: ""That's all I need here. Let's chan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's all I need here. Let's change the topic."

fields.Title: You: ""The workers can't be kings. The ki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The workers can't be kings. The king is king."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That may well be. It's not up to m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That may well be. It's not up to me to decide who is king. But as negotiations go -- it's not a swell start."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The Pines' *core competency* is lo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Pines' *core competency* is logistics -- container shipping, freight, that sort of thing." She points to the small dots on the horizon. "See those airships there, blinking? Those are the shipping side of things..."

fields.Title: You: ""Numbers like that mean nothing to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Numbers like that mean nothing to me."

fields.Title: You: ""Eight percent of *all* cargo in th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Eight percent of *all* cargo in the world? That's quite the endeavour indeed."

fields.Title: You: ""I prefer not to have an opinion on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I prefer not to have an opinion on these things."

fields.Title: You: ""My name is Harrier Du Bois, from P..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My name is Harrier Du Bois, from Precinct 41. I don't have a badge *yet*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Some *arlecchinos* you say?" She s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some *arlecchinos* you say?" She shakes her head. "I'm afraid what I need to tell you is anything but *fun* I really need to discuss it, however. With the RCM -- and I need your badge for that."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I have sympathy for your *highly*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have sympathy for your *highly* unusual conundrum, sir. And I believe you. But as it stands I cannot share any confidential information until I've seen a badge."
fields.Alternate1: "I have sympathy for your *highly* unusal condition, sir. And I believe you. But as it stands I cannot share any confidential information until I've seen *both* your badges."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "She's a negotiator. Just float a fa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's a negotiator. Just float a favour at her. Insinuate.
fields.Alternate1: Easy. Just offer her a *favour*, like I said -- nice and dirty.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "You're doing it! Despite your own b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're doing it! Despite your own best efforts you're still getting in, somehow...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""No. We asked East Motor Tract to r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. We asked East Motor Tract to raise the drawbridge. The road company is a partner of one of our subsidiaries. However..." She pauses, looking to the sea.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""As eager as I am to *share* it, li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As eager as I am to *share* it, lieutenant, once the job is done."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Word has travelled, yes, but nothi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Word has travelled, yes, but nothing of real substance has surfaced yet, I gather?" She smiles, then explains: "Wild Pines has eyes on the intersection -- but not ears."

fields.Title: You: ""Why?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why?"

fields.Title: Volition: "What you meant to say was:"
fields.Dialogue Text: What you meant to say was:

fields.Title: You: ""Can I have some money, ma'am?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can I have some money, ma'am?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course." She nods, she doesn't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course." She nods, she doesn't even smile. "How much do you need."

fields.Title: You: ""I need 30 reál.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need 30 reál."

fields.Title: You: "Nay, 'twould be dishonourable, and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nay, 'twould be dishonourable, and mine honour is my life.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Good morning, officer. I'm Joyce."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good morning, officer. I'm Joyce." She extends her hand in greeting.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A first-rate find -- that should t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A first-rate find -- that should tell you all you need to know about their network, I would imagine."

fields.Title: You: ""It's an octopus whose tentacles re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's an octopus whose tentacles reach every corner of the city."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""So this goes *beyond* Jamrock... s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So this goes *beyond* Jamrock... she looks inland. "At least you now understand the gravity of the situation. And those maps should prove very valuable indeed."

fields.Title: You: ""The *Executor*!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The *Executor*!"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course. That's what I'm here fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. That's what I'm here for."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""And your opinion, detective? If I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And your opinion, detective? If I may ask. I'm a curious and talkative person you see," she explains." Would you say the Débardeurs' Union is..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes. On the last day of the local..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. On the last day of the local chapter elections her daughter phoned in and said she wasn't running anymore -- or coming to work. Ever. End of story."

fields.Title: You: ""This forewoman? Her name?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This forewoman? Her name?"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "With your help -- hopefully -- says..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With your help -- hopefully -- says her warm tone.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It may come to nothing, or it may..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It may come to nothing, or it may just blow the case wide open. I suspect the traffic jam won't disperse for a few more days. You should have the time you need."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "One of the tall buildings overlooki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One of the tall buildings overlooking the roundabout, most likely. That would give them a read on the entire quarter.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And this is my colleague from Prec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And this is my colleague from Precinct 41." He waits for you to show your badge.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""This unmistakably *proletarian* fl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This unmistakably *proletarian* fleet of skiffs." She waves at the nearby fishing boats. "As I said, *plenty* of people drive boats. Of all social strata."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Good afternoon, officer, I'm Joyce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good afternoon, officer, I'm Joyce." She extends her hand in greeting.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Good," she takes a sip of her ther..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good," she takes a sip of her thermal cup.

fields.Title: Empathy: "There is a pinch of *defensiveness*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is a pinch of *defensiveness* in her voice, but it is playful.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It is a little known fact among th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It is a little known fact among those who *police* that the Wayfarer Act specifically denies the RCM the authority to demand anyone's operator license."

fields.Title: You: ""Makes sense, I guess. I mean, look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Makes sense, I guess. I mean, look at me!"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "It's one of the foundational laws i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's one of the foundational laws in Revachol, designed to limit the authority of local institutions. Part of it prohibits the RCM from requesting most documents and licenses without permission from a Coalition representative...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "The woman is silent, smiling while..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman is silent, smiling while the waves lap against the hull. In your hand, under the plastic -- a light blue passport saying *REPUBLIC OF VESPER*. The coat of arms has a lion and an ostrich, sejant.

fields.Title: You: "Look at the photo page."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at the photo page.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Okay. It *is* Antecentennial." She..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. It *is* Antecentennial." She looks at the building looming overhead.
fields.Alternate1: "It *is* Antecentennial." She looks across the water, trying to catch a glimpse of the looming building.

fields.Title: You: ""Something is about to happen." (Po..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Something is about to happen." (Point to your head.) "In here."

fields.Title: You: "Wave your hand next to your head. (..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wave your hand next to your head. (It will help!)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course. You have my full cooper..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. You have my full cooperation -- and the cooperation of the Wild Pines Group."

fields.Title: You: ""Most of them probably don't know w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Most of them probably don't know what that means."

fields.Title: You: ""What are you going to do?" (Procee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you going to do?" (Proceed.)

fields.Title: You: ""The king is dead. Long live the wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The king is dead. Long live the workers!"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "There was a touch of discomfort the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There was a touch of discomfort there. She wants to merely *represent*.

fields.Title: You: ""Fair enough. Tell me something els..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fair enough. Tell me something else."

fields.Title: You: ""What about the Union itself, outsi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What about the Union itself, outside the brothers Claire?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course, officer.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course, officer."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She hands it back to you: "It is a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She hands it back to you: "It is a relief to see a double-yefreitor here. The situation is precarious to say the least. It needs a quick solution, or we will have a blood bath on our hands."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""However," she says, with a touch o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "However," she says, with a touch of regret, "This isn't about my feelings. There's also protocol to consider. I'm afraid I can't say any more until I've seen that badge."

fields.Title: You: "What kind of arrangement would it b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What kind of arrangement would it be?

fields.Title: You: ""You don't understand. It's not lik..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't understand. It's not like a side-case for me. This is my *main thing*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""To answer your question -- yes. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "To answer your question -- yes. They were organized by Wild Pines. The contractors picked them up from Jamrock and drove them over. This is standard practice. The company reserves a right to man its stations."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "You're poor. Poor as balls. You can..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're poor. Poor as balls. You can't ask this person for money. You're too...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "You think your little *communism" p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You think your little *communism" protects you from this feeling? No. The more *demeaning* it is to grovel at her feet...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That's garbage! You're a police of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's garbage! You're a police officer."

fields.Title: You: ""What? I thought you said you had l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What? I thought you said you had like twenty billion or something."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Her tone makes clear that you've vi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her tone makes clear that you've violated some kind of rich-person taboo. Wouldn't be the first time.

fields.Title: You: ""Hydrodynamique E40? Sounds fast.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hydrodynamique E40? Sounds fast."

fields.Title: You: "(Show her your badge.) "I found my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Show her your badge.) "I found my badge, by the way."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["pier.joyce_harrier"] == false  and  CheckItem("badge")  and  Variable["pier.joyce_lynchiong_no_badge_hub_reached"]  and  Variable["XP.joyce_showed_your_badge"] == false  and  Variable["pier.joyce_narco_investigate_open"] == true

fields.Title: You: ""It didn't have Speedfreaks FM.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It didn't have Speedfreaks FM."

fields.Title: You: ""A very loud radio station about mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A very loud radio station about motor carriages and rock music, I think."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. They're spread all over Jamro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. They're spread all over Jamrock... and beyond. I couldn't even identify the exact end points."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Shit yeah, baby, it's the Party Pip..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shit yeah, baby, it's the Party Pipeline! Why would you want to shut that down?

fields.Title: You: ""Because it's sleek... and fish-lik..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because it's sleek... and fish-like."

fields.Title: You: ""Just the *Ex-Something*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just the *Ex-Something*."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, but what *kind* of boat is i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, but what *kind* of boat is it?"

fields.Title: You: ""No need. Tell me something.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No need. Tell me something."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes, extremely. Keep in mind, this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, extremely. Keep in mind, this is a negotiator Mr. Claire has worked with before, and who was more than fair with him and the Union."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "She makes a point of being unromant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She makes a point of being unromantic about it.

fields.Title: You: ""How about you share your informati..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How about you share your information on the lynching -- now that you've seen my badge."

fields.Title: Shivers: "All around you, rain keeps falling..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All around you, rain keeps falling down. On the wooden boards she's standing on, and on the water around you...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Joyce L. Messier. I represent the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Joyce L. Messier. I represent the board of Wild Pines -- the owners of the harbour. You must be from the RCM..." She steps closer and holds out her hand over the railing.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""None taken, officer." They exchang..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "None taken, officer." They exchange a brief handshake. "Either way, I'm glad you're both here now."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm glad to see you here." She wit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm glad to see you here." She withdraws her small hand and picks up her cup.

fields.Title: You: ""How are these talks going?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How are these talks going?"

fields.Title: You: ""You mean Jean-Luc, my Race Mentor?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean Jean-Luc, my Race Mentor? He's a great teacher, a man of *virtù*."

fields.Title: You: ""Do you have a licence for this boa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you have a licence for this boat?"

fields.Title: You: ""Still. I haven't seen anyone else..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Still. I haven't seen anyone else sail a boat around here."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Actually," the lieutenant becomes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually," the lieutenant becomes defensive, "that motor carriage has been specially issued to serve as a patrol and *pursuit* vehicle."

fields.Title: You: ""You lost me there -- I have no ide..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You lost me there -- I have no idea what a Coupris Kineema is."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Rhetoric: "You *need* to make this lady admit..."]
Joyce Messier: ""I *mean* we are on Le Caillou, are..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I *mean* we are on Le Caillou, are we not?" She raises her brow.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need to politicize this. You ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No need to politicize this. You may still ask for the lady's *passport*."

fields.Title: You: "Look at her passport."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at her passport.

fields.Title: You: "It'll come off like I'm envious. An..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It'll come off like I'm envious. And I'm not.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You're *not*? Okay then, just keep..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're *not*? Okay then, just keep on admiring the boat then, unburdened by envy.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes -- anyway." She adjusts her ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- anyway." She adjusts her hair. The permanent wave in her auburn locks radiates victory.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "It happens quicker than a shooting..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It happens quicker than a shooting star -- but did the lieutenant just *wink* at you?

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I am a bourgeois woman and this is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am a bourgeois woman and this is my long, incredibly lightweight, interminably bourgeois boat."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I told you his methods are... unco..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I told you his methods are... unconventional."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm afraid the Emergencies Act was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid the Emergencies Act was put in place by the same Coalition government that leases the RCM the right to police West Revachol."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""But -- I am derailing us. You want..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But -- I am derailing us. You wanted to know about the strike."

fields.Title: You: ""Sounds like an opening gambit." (P..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds like an opening gambit." (Proceed.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: She nods.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""They started as an exploration and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They started as an exploration and cargo fleet conducting trade between the Samaran and Insulindian isolas -- 250 years ago, when Pines' ships explored the South-Semenese and charted Lo Manthang on behalf of the suzerain."

fields.Title: You: ""What is it made of?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is it made of?"

fields.Title: You: ""Is he that bad?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is he that bad?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course." She takes a sip from t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course." She takes a sip from the thermal cup.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Edgar looks *exactly* like his bro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Edgar looks *exactly* like his brother, except for that lazy eye. He also *talks* exactly like Evrart does. And when one's term as foreman is up, the other takes over."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Refreshingly honest, officer." She..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Refreshingly honest, officer." She nods. "The company has tried appeasing in the past, but I'm afraid our concessions have only emboldened Evrart and his brother." She turns to you:

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course." She grabs the mainstay..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course." She grabs the mainstay and leans toward you. "But before we do, officer -- let me be perfectly clear..."
fields.Alternate1: "Of course." She grabs the mainstay and leans toward you: "But before we do, officers -- let me be perfectly clear..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Reports from inside Terminal B sug..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Reports from inside Terminal B suggest it's a hub for the local drug trade. This is an open secret in Martinaise. The Union *controls* the terminal, so it goes to reason..."

fields.Title: You: ""So the strike is *connected* to th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So the strike is *connected* to the lynching?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""With all due respect to these dese..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "With all due respect to these desert cacti, the contents of a few cash registers cannot provide for *two-thousand* men. The local businesses can scarcely provide for themselves."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It appears we're being monitored e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It appears we're being monitored every step we take, colleague." The lieutenant shrugs. "Did we have any other business here?"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Yes. You should be able to take car..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. You should be able to take care of yourself. Not grovel at her beautiful feet, dishonouring yourself and your organization with this request...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""My...." She doesn't know what to s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My...." She doesn't know what to say: "Why do you say that?"

fields.Title: You: ""MONEY!!!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "MONEY!!!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ideas like this one are all part o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ideas like this one are all part of his rare medical condition, ma'am. Nothing to be worried about."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""More lessons in basic reality?" Sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "More lessons in basic reality?" She's positively surprised. "My favourite part of the day! Go ahead, ask me anything."

fields.Title: Composure: "Fast, observantly. Like an electron..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fast, observantly. Like an electronic printer.

fields.Title: You: ""We turned up quite a few *interest..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We turned up quite a few *interesting* things actually..." (Share information.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That speaks of the vastness and so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That speaks of the vastness and sophistication of the operation. Were you able to examine the radio?"

fields.Title: You: ""Unfortunately the dial knob was mi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Unfortunately the dial knob was missing, the radio itself was inoperative."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""An ominous vision..." She nods sol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "An ominous vision..." She nods solemnly. "At least you understand the gravity of the situation. And the maps should prove very valuable indeed."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. I've made up my mind about t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. I've made up my mind about the smuggling investigation..." (Proceed.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Indeed. The company suspects foul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Indeed. The company suspects foul play, but there's nothing they could do, it was a Union matter."

fields.Title: You: ""You'll never guess what I found. M..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You'll never guess what I found. My badge!" (Show her your badge.)

fields.Title: You: "Shake it off."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shake it off.

fields.Title: You: "I'm not ashamed!"
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm not ashamed!

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "There's a trace of irony in his voi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a trace of irony in his voice. Mischief even. This is a tactic.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Don't tell her you've met Evrart *r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't tell her you've met Evrart *right away*. There's time.

fields.Title: You: ""This was your plan all along.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This was your plan all along."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*Oh*. And what happened to it, det..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Oh*. And what happened to it, detective?" She returns the lieutenant's badge.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant breathes a sigh of r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant breathes a sigh of relief. "Good. We won't be needing to go to my Kineema, then."

fields.Title: You: "Don't shake her hand."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't shake her hand.

fields.Title: You: ""Joyce L? What does the 'L' stand f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Joyce L? What does the 'L' stand for?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""They're *not*. That's the problem...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They're *not*. That's the problem. The Union stopped all negotiations a week ago. After that awful lynching took place."

fields.Title: You: ""How long have you been here?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How long have you been here?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And this is my colleague from Prec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And this is my colleague from Precinct 41." He points to you. "I'm afraid he doesn't have his badge at the moment. I hope mine will suffice."

fields.Title: You: ""I drove my motor carriage into the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I drove my motor carriage into the sea, you know. It sank."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "The graciousness of her response ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The graciousness of her response makes you feel glad you didn't hassle her about her papers for no reason.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Laced with just a touch of pity."
fields.Dialogue Text: Laced with just a touch of pity.

fields.Title: You: ""Fine. Anyway..." (Change the subje..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine. Anyway..." (Change the subject.)

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Uhm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Uhm...

fields.Title: You: ""Good thing everyone else has tiny..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good thing everyone else has tiny skiffs."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Nothing happens. For quite a while."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing happens. For quite a while.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You're marbles on glass, dear. Don..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're marbles on glass, dear. Don't worry."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course." She bows slightly. "Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course." She bows slightly. "You have my full cooperation -- and the cooperation of the Wild Pines Group."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""'Fuck off, midget.' Gaumont is sho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'Fuck off, midget.' Gaumont is short of stature, you see."

fields.Title: You: "Who are the other indotribes?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who are the other indotribes?

fields.Title: You: ""How much money does Wild Pines hav..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How much money does Wild Pines have?"

fields.Title: You: ""Wow.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wow."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""And to think -- there are years wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And to think -- there are years when the group books *losses* in the billions..." A wave hits the sloop, she grasps the mainstay for balance.
fields.Alternate1: "And to think -- there are years when the group runs a *loss* of billions..." She turns her eyes towards the wave rising against the sloop.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "She's being sarcastic. Don't take h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's being sarcastic. Don't take her performance literally.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Have you *seen* him?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Have you *seen* him?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As I said, ma'am," the lieutenant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As I said, ma'am," the lieutenant interjects, "his technique may be *very* unconventional. But he *is* an officer of the RCM."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I understand the dictates of proto..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I understand the dictates of protocol, ma'am, but... is there no way around it?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wild Pines seems to be *well appri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wild Pines seems to be *well apprised* of the local drug trade, ma'am. Do you mean to say the Union also *produces* the product? Sells drugs, I mean?"

fields.Title: You: ""There's no way I can take this cas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's no way I can take this case." (Refuse.)
fields.Alternate1: "There's no way we can take this case." (Refuse.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It may come to nothing, or it may..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It may come to nothing, or it may just blow the case wide open. I can keep the drawbridge up for a few more days at least. You should have the time you need."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*If* there is an investigation it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*If* there is an investigation it will be part of an ongoing operation -- subject to confidentiality. I am sure you understand."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I don't believe that for one momen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't believe that for one moment, officer." There is a pause, then her stern expression clears. "I'm just going to assume that departmental regulations prevent you from saying anything more..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""If these *workers* were organized..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If these *workers* were organized by Wild Pines or its affiliates, then it would be a company secret. I could not share it with you -- not yet, at least."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That's the man who was killed..."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's the man who was killed..." She almost takes the photo -- but then stops. "I'm afraid this is a discussion for once we've cleared the lynching question."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""As I was saying..." Her voice brea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As I was saying..." Her voice breaks the silence and suddenly you're back again. Nearby, a seagull pecks at a piece of garbage... "If there's *any* way I may be of assistance, please don't hesitate to ask."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course." She makes a slight bow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course." She makes a slight bowing motion.

fields.Title: You: ""I need 60 reál.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need 60 reál."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Try again, dear. A little lower th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Try again, dear. A little lower this time."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""So would I -- but woe! There is no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So would I -- but woe! There is no such denomination."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "You illustrate the expression by ho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You illustrate the expression by holding an imaginary-- and very, very tiny-- *peone* between your thumb and index finger.

fields.Title: You: ""It's Lieutenant Kitsuragi's favour..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's Lieutenant Kitsuragi's favourite radio station!"

fields.Title: Volition: "Yes. *All* ears. That's how she ope..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. *All* ears. That's how she operates.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A runaway? Good work, this is a ta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A runaway? Good work, this is a tangible lead towards solving the whole mystery."

fields.Title: You: ""What do you mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Perhaps you've noticed that a numb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perhaps you've noticed that a number of lorries are tangled in a traffic jam at the roundabout just now? Interview the drivers who are still hanging about. One of them might be waiting for a *crucial* shipment." She gives you a knowing look.

fields.Title: You: ""The *Ex-Wife*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The *Ex-Wife*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course you're not. It was only..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course you're not. It was only a joke."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Relax. She meant it in jest."
fields.Dialogue Text: Relax. She meant it in jest.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She gives the material another pat...."
fields.Dialogue Text: She gives the material another pat. "What I *can* do for you is answer some *questions*. Nothing like talking to pass a rainy day."

fields.Title: You: ""It happens.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It happens."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Does it?" She arches her brow. "Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Does it?" She arches her brow. "The company suspects foul play, but there's nothing they could do, it was a Union matter."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Sadly, the company records do not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sadly, the company records do not even give a name. She's just *forewoman*, in private correspondence: Holly. I don't even know if it's a sur- or given name. And I don't have access to the Unions' files."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Composure: "Quickly, methodically, like an elec..."]
Joyce Messier: ""I assure you it is no small matter..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I assure you it is no small matter for me either. We *all* share the responsibility for disarming this situation -- I hope you have a badge for me as soon as possible."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'll be frank with you. If I'm goi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll be frank with you. If I'm going to break protocol, I need to be able to justify it to my superiors. They're going to want to see something *tangible*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The Union is conducting drug trade..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Union is conducting drug trade out of the harbour. It's an open secret in Martinaise. Surely it must not come as a *complete* surprise to the RCM either. Perhaps it's time to look into it?"

fields.Title: You: ""I heard something about a *complex..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I heard something about a *complex operation* earlier. This adds up."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She nods. "I'm glad to hear, office..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She nods. "I'm glad to hear, officer. I'm sure you'll find out just what that means, soon enough."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Evrart Claire is a man of the *utm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Evrart Claire is a man of the *utmost* integrity. If you can say one thing about him, it's that he always puts the interests of the workers first."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Like steel. There is strength there..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Like steel. There is strength there. If she wanted, she could sink her nails deep into your skin.

fields.Title: You: ""You seem rich. Can I have some mon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You seem rich. Can I have some money?"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["pier.joyce_vol_white_uncovered"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.pay_for_the_damages"]  and  Variable["TASK.pay_for_the_damages_done"] == false

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Joyce L. Messier. I represent the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Joyce L. Messier. I represent the board of Wild Pines -- the owners of the harbour. You gentlemen must be from the RCM..." She steps closer and holds out her hand over the railing.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Uhm..." She seems confused. "I mea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uhm..." She seems confused. "I meant *you* -- the Revachol Citizens Militia. The police."

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me more about this *behemoth*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me more about this *behemoth*."
fields.Alternate1: "Tell us more about this *behemoth*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My colleague has his peculiarities..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My colleague has his peculiarities. Let's not go into this particular one just yet."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""In any case..." She takes a sip fr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In any case..." She takes a sip from her thermal cup.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Rhetoric: "You *need* to make this lady admit..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Actually, you don't.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, you don't."

fields.Title: You: "The what now?"
fields.Dialogue Text: The what now?

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "The woman -- born in the year 3 in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The woman -- born in the year 3 in the Commune of Revachol -- smiles at you, face adorned with frown lines and crow's feet. The photo is recent. The name reads Rejoyce Leyton-Messier.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Why *Dolores*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why *Dolores*?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Hmm. Well, it means nothing to me...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm. Well, it means nothing to me. I think I'll stick with the factory name. But thank you for the suggestion."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, may I remind you that M..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Detective, may I remind you that Mrs. Messier is a *professional negotiator*?" He doesn't look like he thinks you'll best her in single combat.

fields.Title: You: "Fire back -- quick!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Fire back -- quick!

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I assure you, they drove quite the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I assure you, they drove quite the hard bargain for this space -- but you're right."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I assure you, they drove quite a h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I assure you, they drove quite a hard bargain for this space -- but you're right."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The thoughts happen *inside* his b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The thoughts happen *inside* his brain," the lieutenant explains.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh, dear, that *is* serious. If th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, dear, that *is* serious. If this is in any way dangerous for your health, we can always resume our conversation later."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't worry. He'll be *fine*. It's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't worry. He'll be *fine*. It's all part of his unusual medical condition." He opens his notebook. "Continue, please. He has questions."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Did someone say *shooting yourself..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Did someone say *shooting yourself in the foot*?

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""In its defence, another said *DEMA..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In its defence, another said *DEMAND DEMOCRACY*. Pretty tame stuff compared to *EVERY WORKER -- A MEMBER OF THE BOARD*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Personally, I don't think it has t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Personally, I don't think it has the same *pizzazzo* as *EVERY WORKER -- a MEMBER OF THE BOARD*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I don't, in fact." She shakes her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't, in fact." She shakes her head. "I'm afraid what I need to tell you is wholly unrelated to art. I really need to discuss it, however. With the RCM -- and I need your badge for that."

fields.Title: You: ""It's possible. After a night of he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's possible. After a night of heavy drinking I lost all memory of my life and the world."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh, *dear*..." She sighs with comp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, *dear*..." She sighs with compassion, sadness even. "I suppose this does explain some of the more *curious* turns in our conversation."

fields.Title: You: ""This boat, for example. And a home..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This boat, for example. And a home somewhere! I *only* have this case."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's quite straightforward. Someon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's quite straightforward. Someone is using Terminal B to smuggle raw ingredients from the Samaran isola into Revachol with the Union's blessing. Wild Pines has suspected it for years."

fields.Title: You: ""What proof do you have that the Un..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What proof do you have that the Union is involved?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "They must have someone in an overlo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: They must have someone in an overlook position, near the gates...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The... *scabs*?" She raises her br..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The... *scabs*?" She raises her brow. "You mean the huddled masses of Jamrock, come to plead for work where the Union refuses to?"

fields.Title: You: ""Do you know something about these..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you know something about these tattoos?" (Show her the photo.)

fields.Title: You: ""I need 130 reál.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need 130 reál."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That's a reasonable sum -- not too..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a reasonable sum -- not too small, not fantastically large." She reaches into her raincoat and pulls out a zip bag -- in it you see paper notes arranged like black gills.
fields.Alternate1: "That's a good sum. Not too small, not fantastically large like a billion." She reaches into her raincoat and pulls out a zip bag made of see-through plastic.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... unusual medical episode.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "... unusual medical episode."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She removes a few notes and hands t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She removes a few notes and hands them to you. The paper is cold and oily to the touch.

fields.Title: You: ""You bribed me all right. I'm your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You bribed me all right. I'm your little *peone* now."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm still getting my head around t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm still getting my head around this whole *money* concept. You were just helping me out."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That's heartening to hear. There a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's heartening to hear. There are too few honourable men in Revachol." She gives you a slight bow. "Now how else can I help the RCM today, besides supplementing its salaries?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""By love, you did!" She inspects th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "By love, you did!" She inspects the piece of blue plastic, her eyes scanning from left to right.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Good evening, officer, I'm Joyce."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good evening, officer, I'm Joyce." She extends her hand in greeting.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""What is La Puta Madre?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is La Puta Madre?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The Union won *significant* conces..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Union won *significant* concessions -- including overtime pay *and* a medical plan. This time their demands are more... I guess you could say *aggressive*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She continues: "The literage the lo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She continues: "The literage the local producers must get from this terminal alone must be *oceanic*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant clears his throat au..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant clears his throat audibly.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Now, per our original agreement, i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now, per our original agreement, it's time for me to share company secrets with you." There's a change in her demeanour. A caution comes over her. A tension.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""What?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Thank you for the suggestion. I se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you for the suggestion. I see the word has emotional resonance for you. For me, sadly -- none. So I will stick with the factory name."

fields.Title: You: ""Answer me a question.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Answer me a question."

fields.Title: You: "(Better not to poke further) "That'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Better not to poke further) "That's good. This way you can answer me some questions."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Downright *haunting* if you ask me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Downright *haunting* if you ask me. The Wild Pines suspected foul play, but what could they do? It was a Union matter."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""His medical condition makes him a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "His medical condition makes him a little *grumpy*, ma'am. I hope that's not a problem."

fields.Title: You: ""I just like the name for some reas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I just like the name for some reason."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I am sorry for the inconvenience,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am sorry for the inconvenience, Lieutenant Kitsuragi. But we need them trapped here. This is a unique opportunity. I'm sure you understand."

fields.Title: You: ""I need 25 reál.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need 25 reál."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I am glad to hear that. Because le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am glad to hear that. Because let me tell you: we are in *dire* waters. The sooner the probe is finished the sooner I can share *crucial* information with you."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She takes a sip of tea. "Now, is th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She takes a sip of tea. "Now, is there anything I can do for you in the meanwhile? Tea, perhaps?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Frighten me?" She smiles. "I'm not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Frighten me?" She smiles. "I'm not frightened easily, but I understand -- some things are best for the police to keep to themselves."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I was dispatched to handle a strik..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was dispatched to handle a strike, not a lynching. Anything I can do to assist the RCM in this matter, I will, gladly."

fields.Title: You: ""You seem smart, I need someone to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You seem smart, I need someone to give me a low-down on this... *reality* we're in."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["pier.joyce_wise_sounding"]  and  Variable["TASK.get_reality_lowdown"]  and  Variable["pier.joyce_realityhub_reached"] == false

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Nothing, honestly. I've said it to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing, honestly. I've said it to every drunk in town and you're the first one who's responded."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""What can I say? The Union employs..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What can I say? The Union employs a giant covered in tattoos." She pauses. "A racist giant. I guess that's part of their *big tent* organization now."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And this is my colleague from Prec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And this is my colleague from Precinct 41, Detective Du Bois." He points to you. "I'm afraid Harry doesn't have his badge at the moment. I hope mine will suffice."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I haven't seen anyone else drive a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I haven't seen anyone else drive a souped-up Coupris Kineema motor carriage either."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Neither is this." The woman pats t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Neither is this." The woman pats the cabin hardtop. "A toy, I mean. It's a machine for crossing long distances in the bay of Revachol. Between the city and the islands."
fields.Alternate1: "Neither is that." The woman nods toward the sloop. "A toy, I mean. It's a machine for crossing long distances in the bay of Revachol. Between the city and the islands."

fields.Title: You: "Let it be."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let it be.

fields.Title: You: ""What do you mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean?"

fields.Title: You: ""How about... Dolores.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How about... Dolores."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Except he isn't.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Except he isn't."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""No worries." She takes another sip..."]
Joyce Messier: ""You stood there for the longest ti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You stood there for the longest time! And it looked like you were having trouble forming a sentence."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What the ma'am means is that the E..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What the ma'am means is that the Emergencies Act and the RCM both get their authority from the Coalition Government."

fields.Title: You: ""Nope. That's weak.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nope. That's weak."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Just so you understand, this is bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just so you understand, this is but one of *twenty-two* terminals owned by Wild Pines. Essentially -- not only are they *kings* of the company, they are also kings of the 72,000 employees of Wild Pines Group."

fields.Title: You: ""That's *it*? I thought Wild Pines..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's *it*? I thought Wild Pines was supposed to be big time."

fields.Title: You: ""Where does Wild Pines *get* all th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where does Wild Pines *get* all these billions?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Centuries of care, deliberation --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Centuries of care, deliberation -- and *madness* -- have gone into this endeavour. Vessels pass through the Great Unrest to re-emerge with apricots in tow. The logic of the system is totalizing... It's taken *everything* from its employees to build it."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A conglomerate the size of Wild Pi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A conglomerate the size of Wild Pines is like a shark -- if it stops moving and growing it will die. Then what becomes of those 72,000 families? It is a tremendous responsibility."

fields.Title: You: ""Evrart is a hero of the worker's m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Evrart is a hero of the worker's movement."

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "If you were to prick him with somet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If you were to prick him with something sharp you could see it oozing out -- a knife, maybe? No -- a rapier!

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Why do you think so?" Her voice is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why do you think so?" Her voice is calm, there is only curiosity there.

fields.Title: You: ""They're good labour men. Can't fau..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They're good labour men. Can't fault them for a little *corruption*."

fields.Title: You: ""Then I'll find it somehow. Let's t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then I'll find it somehow. Let's talk about something else until I do."

fields.Title: Composure: "Quickly, methodically, like an elec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Quickly, methodically, like an electric printing machine.

fields.Title: You: ""Remember when I told you I literal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Remember when I told you I literally cannot remember even the most basic facts about reality?"

fields.Title: You: ""What kind of *ingredients* are we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What kind of *ingredients* are we talking about here?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The *lorries,*" she stresses. "Som..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The *lorries,*" she stresses. "Someone needs to move the ingredients from the harbour into the city. Once they reach Jamrock they're distributed to a network of local manufacturers, well beyond our grasp. But in transit they are *vulnerable*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""In any case, you've held up your e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In any case, you've held up your end of our arrangement. Now it's my turn..."

fields.Title: You: "Let her continue."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let her continue.

fields.Title: You: ""I have a photo of the victim's tat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have a photo of the victim's tattoos." (Show it to her.)
fields.Alternate1: "Can you tell me about these tattoos again?"
fields.Alternate2: "Now can you tell me about these tattoos?" (Show her the photo.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I fear I've told you all I know."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I fear I've told you all I know." She takes the photo. "It's an Oranjese Map of the Waterways -- or some version of it. It depicts the travels this man made while he was still alive."

fields.Title: You: ""Your name is Rejoyce?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Your name is Rejoyce?"

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "A breeze carries with it the faint..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A breeze carries with it the faint scent of juniper and oranges.

fields.Title: You: "As I should be -- for even consider..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As I should be -- for even considering it. This is a woman and I'm a *man*.

fields.Title: You: ""I NEED MONEY!!!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I NEED MONEY!!!"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Whoa, whoa. Did you see how easy th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whoa, whoa. Did you see how easy that was? Ask her for more! *Toot-toot* Train to moneytown!

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Can you eat honour? Are you an *hon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Can you eat honour? Are you an *honour-vore?* Give me a break...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Uhm..." The woman dips her fingers..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uhm..." The woman dips her fingers back into the bag. "I really did bring as little cash as possible, to avoid attention. So here you are, the last of bit of filthy *lucre* I can share."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This may seem like *odd* behaviour..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This may seem like *odd* behaviour for a police officer, ma'am, but it's a perfectly common side effect of his..." He squints at you.

fields.Title: You: ""Funny that your worried about this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Funny that your worried about this and not your ruthless exploitation of the entire *human race*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She clears her throat. "Now, how el..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She clears her throat. "Now, how else can I help the RCM today, besides supplementing its salaries?"

fields.Title: You: ""The people who live there now lead..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The people who live there now lead a different *lifestyle* if you know what I mean."

fields.Title: You: ""A seriously bad guy.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A seriously bad guy."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh, I *do* like the sound of that...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, I *do* like the sound of that." A smirk passes her face. "It sounds so *decisive*, so..."

fields.Title: You: ""Why is that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why is that?"

fields.Title: You: ""No you're not. You look young.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No you're not. You look young."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She looks at you, expectantly. It i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She looks at you, expectantly. It is as if you have said nothing -- because you have not. No begging words have left your mouth...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I can't hear you, darling... speak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't hear you, darling... speak up, please."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why I had to call East Motor Tract..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why I had to call East Motor Tract -- and *beg* them to open the drawbridge for me. I'd wondered since I first drove *in*. On my motor carriage."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "She means: you know her closer now,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She means: you know her closer now, in some way you know her soul a bit.

fields.Title: Logic: "Remember those bold, new exotic rev..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Remember those bold, new exotic revenue streams Evrart said he was going to fund his harbour with? You should go back and ask him about that.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Let's say I was not making the kin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's say I was not making the kind of progress I'd hoped for when I first arrived..."

fields.Title: You: ""Does she have a name?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Does she have a name?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""We are. And the city of Revachol i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We are. And the city of Revachol is on the island of Le Caillou."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Hmm, I suppose that one *does* hav..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm, I suppose that one *does* have a rather loud electrical engine." She does not quite understand what you meant. "A specific drone. In any case...."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I just renewed its safety inspecti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I just renewed its safety inspection last month, officer. It is completely seaworthy. In fact, it's taken part in not one, but *two* Insulindic regattas, and finished once."
fields.Alternate1: "I just renewed its safety inspection last month, officers. It is completely seaworthy. In fact, it's taken part in not one, but *two* Insulindic regattas. Even finished once."

fields.Title: You: ""What happened the other time?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happened the other time?"

fields.Title: Authority: "You need to save face if you want h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You need to save face if you want her respect. DEMAND that passport!

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "It's a law that keeps Revachol what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a law that keeps Revachol what it is -- in limbo.

fields.Title: You: "Anything else?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Anything else?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm enjoying this part of the inte..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm enjoying this part of the interview -- it has *so* little to do with the murder we're investigating."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Then certainly you must know that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then certainly you must know that under the Wayfarer Act the RCM doesn't have the authority to demand anyone's operator license. Freedom of movement and all that."

fields.Title: You: ""No -- it's a symbol of our subjuga..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No -- it's a symbol of our subjugation to *foreign* capital. The bad kind of capital."
fields.Alternate1: "No. You're siphoning off honest Revacholian tax revenue to shifty-eyed Vespertine financiers."

fields.Title: You: "Why am I even thinking about this?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why am I even thinking about this? I have police work to do.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Have it your way."
fields.Dialogue Text: Have it your way.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He's trying to signal something. He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's trying to signal something. He *wants* you to play up your condition.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course."

fields.Title: You: "Keep doing it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep doing it.

fields.Title: You: ""They will come from my head -- the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They will come from my head -- the arguments."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Don't worry. It'll get better when..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't worry. It'll get better when you die.

fields.Title: You: "Leave it alone."
fields.Dialogue Text: Leave it alone.

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me about this Union boss -- M..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me about this Union boss -- Mr. Claire."
fields.Alternate1: "What do you think of Evrart?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""They are having a blast -- but how..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They are having a blast -- but how can they *afford* it? After four months my assumption was they would prefer a more *practical* solution."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's made of one thousand millions..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's made of one thousand millions -- a million is made of a thousand thousands."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A conglomerate the size of the Wil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A conglomerate the size of the Wild Pines is like a shark -- if it stops moving it will die. Then what becomes of those 72,000 families? It's a tremendous responsibility."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You know more than you let on." Sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know more than you let on." She takes a sip and looks you over afresh. "Certainly it helped, but most of the original indotribes have failed or been absorbed. To survive Wild Pines had to grow and adapt. No suzerain did that."

fields.Title: You: ""Between Evrart the Human Leech and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Between Evrart the Human Leech and Measurehead, this Union sounds like a *motley crew*. I'm into it." (Wink.)

fields.Title: You: ""The thing is -- I don't have a bad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The thing is -- I don't have a badge at this moment."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I was hoping your *condition* was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was hoping your *condition* was rhetorical, detective. A questioning technique."

fields.Title: You: ""It's not.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm afraid I can't say any more un..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid I can't say any more until we've taken care of formal protocol."

fields.Title: You: ""And you want us to investigate." (..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And you want us to investigate." (Move on.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""In the meantime, let me know if th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In the meantime, let me know if there's any other way I may be of assistance." She takes another long sip from her seemingly bottomless thermal cup.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""I wouldn't normally break protocol..."]
Joyce Messier: ""If these *strikebreakers* were org..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If these *strikebreakers* were organized by Wild Pines or its affiliates, then it would be a company secret. I could not share it with you -- not yet, at least."

fields.Title: You: "What, why not?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What, why not?

fields.Title: You: "What nice fabrics."
fields.Dialogue Text: What nice fabrics.

fields.Title: You: "What lustrous hair."
fields.Dialogue Text: What lustrous hair.

fields.Title: You: "Say it: "Can I have some money?""
fields.Dialogue Text: Say it: "Can I have some money?"
fields.tooltip6: Did not tell her about investigation.

fields.Title: You: ""Khnnnnnnnffff...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Khnnnnnnnffff..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Excuse me, I didn't hear you." Her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Excuse me, I didn't hear you." Her voice is kind, a little hoarse from the wind.

fields.Title: You: ""No, I didn't. Let's talk about som..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I didn't. Let's talk about something else."

fields.Title: You: ""I need 100 reál.""
