fields.Dialogue Text: "I need 100 reál."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She removes a few notes and hands t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She removes a few notes and hands them to you. The paper is cold and oily to the touch.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That's a good sum -- not too small..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a good sum -- not too small, not fantastically large." She reaches into her raincoat and pulls out a zip bag -- in it you see paper notes arranged like black gills.
fields.Alternate1: "That's a good sum. Not too small, not fantastically large like a billion." She reaches into her raincoat and pulls out a zip bag made of see-through plastic.

fields.Title: You: ""It's possible there's even a conne..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's possible there's even a connection to La Puta Madre."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, he's not. Our friend here has..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, he's not. Our friend here has quite the sense of humour, part of his technique, you see?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Well," she smiles and points towar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well," she smiles and points toward the roundabout, "here's your chance."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""And *now* people are getting *lync..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And *now* people are getting *lynched*, I hear. Behind the Whirling-in-Rags... a disastrous situation if there ever was one."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Very absurd," she nods. "Thank you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very absurd," she nods. "Thank you for the suggestion. I will stick with the factory name for now -- but thank you."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Then what does that say?" She poin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then what does that say?" She points to the plaque on the side of the pier. "Does it say *docking reserved for residents of Rue de Saint-Ghislaine 33A*?"

fields.Title: You: ""Were you not overexposed? Does tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Were you not overexposed? Does that not cause insomnia?"

fields.Title: You: ""Neither do I." (Pat your similarly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Neither do I." (Pat your similarly wet cloak.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Very rugged," she nods in approval..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very rugged," she nods in approval. "Good choice. Now, I suspect you had questions -- nothing like talking to pass a rainy day, am I right?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Clever. Few suspect a woman in thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Clever. Few suspect a woman in this sort of skulduggery. Good move on their part."

fields.Title: You: ""He can't be that bad.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "He can't be that bad."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I cannot rescind that promise." Sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I cannot rescind that promise." She smiles apologetically. "To my knowledge, the drivers are still at the roundabout. I will tell you *everything* I know -- when you've finished with them."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Meaning: the information she has wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Meaning: the information she has will raise the stakes in this game.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He looks at you expectantly. Then i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He looks at you expectantly. Then it dawns on him...

fields.Title: You: ""My badge. Yes. Of course. My badge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My badge. Yes. Of course. My badge that I have on me."

fields.Title: You: "Shake her hand."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shake her hand.

fields.Title: You: ""What can you tell me about this st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What can you tell me about this strike?"
fields.Alternate1: "Tell me more about the strike at the harbour."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And how are the talks going?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And how are the talks going?"

fields.Title: You: ""Oh, you mean Measurehead?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, you mean Measurehead?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This isn't the first time the Unio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This isn't the first time the Union has gone on strike?"

fields.Title: You: ""I think I have a handle on the boa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think I have a handle on the boat thing." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course there are." She looks ar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course there are." She looks around. "We are on an archipelago. How else are you supposed to get around?"

fields.Title: You: ""That's not mine. It belongs to my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's not mine. It belongs to my partner, Lieutenant Kitsuragi."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course. The situation is precar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. The situation is precarious."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The Wayfarer Act is one of the few..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Wayfarer Act is one of the few pieces of legislation governing human interaction in the Revachol Zone of Control, along with the Emergency Trade and Aliments Acts.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That is good to hear, madam." He o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That is good to hear, madam." He opens his notebook. "My colleague will take the lead on this interview. I should let you know that he's recovering from an *unusual* medical episode -- *very* unusual -- but I can assure you of his ultimate competency."

fields.Title: You: ""This house was built *before* the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This house was built *before* the Revolution."

fields.Title: You: ""A thought is going to come out of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A thought is going to come out of my head and into my mouth -- and I will say it."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She quietly nods. "You have my full..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She quietly nods. "You have my full cooperation."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The octopus that straddles Revachol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The octopus that straddles Revachol. The *Emergencies Act* is the cornerstone of post-war Revachol, inseparable from the world it created.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Then you might also like their oth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then you might also like their other slogan: 'DEMAND DEMOCRACY!'"

fields.Title: You: ""So what do *they* do?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So what do *they* do?"

fields.Title: Logic: "No, wait. The chief negotiator hear..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, wait. The chief negotiator heard it from a man at the gates? Surely the Wild Pines Group has more effective channels of information. After all, 2,200 people are on strike -- this is a big deal for them.

fields.Title: You: ""You're in *good* company, it seems.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're in *good* company, it seems."

fields.Title: You: ""Got it. Tell me something else.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Got it. Tell me something else."

fields.Title: You: ""What exactly is a *billion*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What exactly is a *billion*?"

fields.Title: You: ""It probably helps to start out wit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It probably helps to start out with a royal monopoly."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""He is the most corrupt individual..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He is the most corrupt individual I have ever seen. And I deal with men like him for a living. If there is anyone more venal, more irredeemably nepotistic -- then it's his twin brother, Edgar."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The Débardeurs' Union was once a p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Débardeurs' Union was once a perfectly normal institution. Twenty years ago, anyway. It must *not* have been easy to establish under the Emergency Act, but they did it. I can respect that."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Pleased to meet you, lieutenant,"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pleased to meet you, lieutenant," she inspects the piece of blue plastic, the faded green pearls of her eyes scanning left to right.

fields.Title: Logic: "Consider this -- perhaps she has be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Consider this -- perhaps she has been planning it all along? That you convince *yourself* into colluding with her?

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She's silent. The wind flaps the sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's silent. The wind flaps the sail above her.
fields.Alternate1: She's silent. The sloops sail is flapping in the wind.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I will be frank with you." She put..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I will be frank with you." She puts down her thermal cup. "If I'm going to break protocol I need to be able to justify it to my superiors. They're going to want to see something very *tangible*."

fields.Title: You: ""Why didn't you come to the RCM ear..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why didn't you come to the RCM earlier?"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "It sounds like she tried looking in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It sounds like she tried looking into it herself. But she's clearly not the type your typical lorryman would confide in.

fields.Title: You: ""We have discovered enough to concl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We have discovered enough to conclude -- for now."

fields.Title: You: ""You sent us on a wild goose chase...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You sent us on a wild goose chase. There's nothing to investigate."

fields.Title: You: ""No, I mean scabs.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I mean scabs."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Maybe you can ask her for some *sto..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe you can ask her for some *stock tips* -- that's a *maybe*. Or a *job*. But you're sure as hell too ashamed to ask for cash buddy.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Excuse me, I didn't hear you." her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Excuse me, I didn't hear you." her voice is kind, a little hoarse from the wind. "Did you say *money*?"

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "What is this? An athletic challenge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What is this? An athletic challenge? Scream it from the top of your lungs immediately, show that asshole!

fields.Title: You: ""I need 70 reál.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need 70 reál."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "There must be about 200 reál in tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There must be about 200 reál in that zip bag. Maybe a little less. Plus some change at the bottom.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That's a good sum -- not too small..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a good sum -- not too small, not fantastically large." She reaches into her raincoat and pulls out a zip bag -- in it you see paper notes arranged like black gills.
fields.Alternate1: "That's a good sum. Not too small, not fantastically large like a billion." She reaches into her raincoat and pulls out a zip bag made of see-through plastic.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She laughs out loud. It is a beauti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She laughs out loud. It is a beautiful laugh, laced with glee and a certain sharpness. It travels far on the water...

fields.Title: You: ""I saw a really advanced radio syst..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I saw a really advanced radio system with *a lot* of stations saved."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She nods. "Sensible for her to disa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She nods. "Sensible for her to disable access to such essential information."

fields.Title: You: ""Why are you trying to shut down th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why are you trying to shut down the Party Pipeline?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Okay. How about Cor-de-Leite '19...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. How about Cor-de-Leite '19. Why?" She taps on the side of the boat, it makes a hollow sound....

fields.Title: You: ""I could use a coat like that. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I could use a coat like that. The rain is freezing."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Disappeared?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Disappeared?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you for your concern, ma'am...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you for your concern, ma'am. We'll be just fine."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Did you? Wonderful!" She inspects..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you? Wonderful!" She inspects the piece of blue plastic, the faded green pearls of her eyes scanning left to right.

fields.Title: You: ""This case is what I will be *known..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This case is what I will be *known* by!"

fields.Title: Half Light: "*Qualified pleasure craft operator*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Qualified pleasure craft operator*... so charming. Where's the damn licence?

fields.Title: Logic: "Uncovering Union secrets could also..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Uncovering Union secrets could also give you an upper hand when dealing with them.

fields.Title: Half Light: "How bad can the info she has be?"
fields.Dialogue Text: How bad can the info she has be?

fields.Title: You: ""What do you mean *beguiled*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean *beguiled*?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. They're *wunderbar*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. They're *wunderbar*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I was just being polite -- even sc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was just being polite -- even schoolchildren know the Wayfarer Act."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know... feels pretty.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know... feels pretty."

fields.Title: You: "Actually, yes. I need to nail her f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Actually, yes. I need to nail her for this.

fields.Title: You: ""Funny, I don't see any other *eel'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Funny, I don't see any other *eel's heels* around."
fields.Alternate1: "Funny, I didn't see any other eel's heels docking there."

fields.Title: You: ""I swear to god I'm usually sharp...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I swear to god I'm usually sharp. I don't know what happened. Why am I not *killing it*?!"

fields.Title: You: ""How about we concentrate on the di..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How about we concentrate on the dishonourable thing that happened, huh?"

fields.Title: You: ""What is your role in this, precise..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is your role in this, precisely?"

fields.Title: You: ""What are their demands?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are their demands?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: She nods.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You mean aside from being the term..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean aside from being the terminal's legal owners?" She gives you a little smile. "Who are responsible for moving *eight* percent of the world's cargo?"

fields.Title: You: ""You don't keep it moving -- the wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't keep it moving -- the workers do. The company is nothing without them."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A company getaway. For a weekend o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A company getaway. For a weekend or a summer holiday. Then came the Revolution, but that's another matter..." She takes a sip. "I'm here to make sure the Pines can fulfil their responsibilities to the place they *built*."

fields.Title: You: ""I'd rather you tell me about somet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'd rather you tell me about something else."

fields.Title: You: ""Basically a socialist mob.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Basically a socialist mob."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Point taken." She falls silent. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Point taken." She falls silent. The crow's feet in the corner of her eye deepen. She looks to the city behind you, then to the coast. "But enough about Evrart -- what else can I do for you?"
fields.Alternate1: "Point taken." She falls silent. The crow's feet in the corner of her eye deepen. She looks to the village behind you, then to the sea. "But enough about Evrart -- what else can I do for you?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""What happened to it, detective?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happened to it, detective?"

fields.Title: You: ""They said it was for a *performanc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They said it was for a *performance*. You know how artists are nowadays."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I... see..." She looks increasingl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I... see..." She looks increasingly worried. "So are you saying you *lost* your badge during the course of this *episode*?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "Perhaps she even knew beforehand of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Perhaps she even knew beforehand of your affliction? A sudden pinch of paranoia comes over you...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*Or*..." She picks the cup back up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Or*..." She picks the cup back up. "You can recover your badge -- though if I may be blunt with you, it sounds like that may be a lost cause."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective," the lieutenant closes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Detective," the lieutenant closes his notebook. "A word in private before we continue."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Her irises are light green, like th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her irises are light green, like the River Esperance in bright daylight, upstream where it's clearer.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was a shakedown of local bus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There was a shakedown of local businesses preceding the strike. Many were squeezed to bankruptcy to fund it."

fields.Title: You: ""I'll look into it, probe the drive..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll look into it, probe the drivers, see what it yields." (Accept.)
fields.Alternate1: "We will take this case, probe the drivers, see what it yields." (Accept.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I am very sad to hear that, office..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am very sad to hear that, officer." Her voice is ice cold and laced with worry. "If you change your mind, please let me know. If not, good luck finding your badge -- and your memory."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "One of the tall buildings overlooki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One of the tall buildings overlooking the roundabout -- it would give them a read on the entire quarter.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Rhetoric: "It's implied she's open to discussi..."]
Joyce Messier: "Why yes! Tucked away under that stu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why yes! Tucked away under that sturdy green raincoat, almost rustic in its simplicity -- a silk shirt and matching scarf around her gentle throat...

fields.Title: You: ""I've told you what I've found, now..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've told you what I've found, now it's your turn." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I appreciate you placing your trus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I appreciate you placing your trust in me. Thank you again for looking into this matter. You have my gratitude -- and the gratitude of Wild Pines Group..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""About the boat?" A wisp of steam r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "About the boat?" A wisp of steam rises from her thermal cup.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, forget the stupid Wayfarer A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, forget the stupid Wayfarer Act. I had another question..." (Back off.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I assure you, officer, these are *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I assure you, officer, these are *not* the sort of parties you'd want to attend."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "She has no *idea* what kind of part..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She has no *idea* what kind of parties you've been to.

fields.Title: You: ""Cool, but your boat really needs a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cool, but your boat really needs a name."

fields.Title: You: ""How about the *Ex-* something.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How about the *Ex-* something."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Good afternoon, officers, I'm Joyc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good afternoon, officers, I'm Joyce." She extends her hand in greeting.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Very keen of you, officer. I do al..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very keen of you, officer. I do also have *saudetic syndrome* from overexposure to the pale. It makes me roost in the night. Like an owl."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes. Keep in mind, this is a negot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Keep in mind, this is a negotiator Mr. Claire has worked with before, and who was more than fair with him and the Union."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm glad you asked. There was a wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm glad you asked. There was a woman -- the previous forewoman of the Union. She disappeared."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The Wayfarer Act specifically deni..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Wayfarer Act specifically denies the RCM the authority to demand anyone's operator license. It's a *little known fact* among us law officials."

fields.Title: Drama: "Unbelievable, sire. Even the *perfo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unbelievable, sire. Even the *performance* artists didn't work.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""What is that lieutenant?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is that lieutenant?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That's a good sum -- not too small..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a good sum -- not too small, not fantastically large." She reaches into her raincoat and pulls out a zip bag -- in it you see paper notes arranged like black gills.
fields.Alternate1: "That's a good sum. Not too small, not fantastically large like a billion." She reaches into her raincoat and pulls out a zip bag made of see-through plastic.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "It's hard to get a read on her prec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's hard to get a read on her precise disposition, but she *appears* helpful.

fields.Title: Empathy: "She doesn't like it. Probably a bad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She doesn't like it. Probably a bad memory. Mean girls at school or some ancient lover...

fields.Title: Authority: "You'll be indebted to her, in a way..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You'll be indebted to her, in a way. But one step ahead of the Union in another...

fields.Title: Logic: "Remember those bold, new exotic rev..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Remember those bold, new exotic revenue streams Evrart said he was going to fund his harbour with? You should go back and ask him about that.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Why, yes I am..." She looks at the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why, yes I am..." She looks at the deck under her feet. Green and white sails flutter overhead.

fields.Title: You: ""RCM -- what is that? I'm a little..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "RCM -- what is that? I'm a little *foggy* here."
fields.Alternate1: "What exactly is the RCM? I remember hearing it from somewhere."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh, so you've *met* him." She take..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, so you've *met* him." She takes a sip of tea. "Has he beguiled you with his inane theories?"

fields.Title: You: ""*He* didn't do anything. It was th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*He* didn't do anything. It was the indisputable truth of his theories!"

fields.Title: You: "Why should I blame it on an artist?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Why should I blame it on an artist?

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You mean someone *stole* your badg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean someone *stole* your badge?" Her brow is slightly arched.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""No matter *whose* it is. A motor c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No matter *whose* it is. A motor carriage is just a tool. You need it to do your job -- as I do mine. It's just a means of getting where you need to go."

fields.Title: You: ""That's good enough for me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's good enough for me."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Unless it's their *passport*, no...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Unless it's their *passport*, no. Do you want to ask for the lady's passport?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The one time this busted up cabbage..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The one time this busted up cabbage has something useful for your *job* you just want to stare at some boat. Fine. Knock yourself out.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""My sloop? I like it a lot." Her li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My sloop? I like it a lot." Her lips curl into a wry smile. "It's the *eel's hips*, baby."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Technically speaking, you *don't*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Technically speaking, you *don't*."

fields.Title: You: "Uhm... why?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Uhm... why?

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Charge! You've got the guns and the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Charge! You've got the guns and the ammo.
fields.Alternate1: Before you do, it might be pertinent to ask a few more questions... learn whatever you can about this *boat* of hers.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I am a bourgeois woman and this is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am a bourgeois woman and this is my fast, lightweight, interminably bourgeois boat."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I can see your hand is getting tir..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can see your hand is getting tired now -- there is no need to continue. No one is keeping score."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Officer, I am *so* sorry for the w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer, I am *so* sorry for the whole pier situation."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't *think* it was a stroke.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't *think* it was a stroke."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""So I hoped." She nods. "But this t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I hoped." She nods. "But this type of opening is usually followed by a more reasonable offer. I have yet to hear one, just the same nonsensical slogan repeated over and over again..."

fields.Title: You: ""No.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A pleasure to meet you, Harry -- w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A pleasure to meet you, Harry -- what happened to your badge?"

fields.Title: You: ""The money I owe is *so much* less..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The money I owe is *so much* less than that."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Shall we talk about something else..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Shall we talk about something else maybe?" Her voice is kind, if anything she sounds a little confused.

fields.Title: You: ""I need 10,000 reál.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need 10,000 reál."

fields.Title: Empathy: "She's surprisingly nonchalant about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's surprisingly nonchalant about this. Could it be that she somehow knows more about your predicament than she's letting on?

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Really put your back into it. Yell..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Really put your back into it. Yell it from the top of your lungs!

fields.Title: You: ""I would like 0.1 cents.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I would like 0.1 cents."

fields.Title: You: ""Can I have some more?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can I have some more?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right, ma'am, that donation..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, ma'am, that donations are permitted under the Emergency Act, unseemly as it may be, as long as they're properly logged with the precinct..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The *performative experience* has..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The *performative experience* has ended. Good -- what can I help you with?"

fields.Title: You: ""I've got some more questions about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've got some more questions about *reality*."

fields.Title: You: ""I found research about something c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I found research about something called *ULAN* frequencies related to the operation."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I... fail to see the relevance of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I... fail to see the relevance of this station, but..." she smiles warmly, "I'll defer to your judgement. Was there anything else?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Now's neither the time nor the pla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now's neither the time nor the place to discuss such matters. What else did your investigation turn up?"
fields.Alternate1: "Right." She glances sideways at the lieutenant. "It's really not the time or place to discuss such matters. What else did you find in your investigation?"

fields.Title: You: ""Huh, interesting. I had another qu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Huh, interesting. I had another question..."

fields.Title: You: ""What happened to this... Gaumont?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happened to this... Gaumont?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's a pleasure craft. A nineteen-..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a pleasure craft. A nineteen-pacer. It also happens to be rated for Category 1 racing. Though these days I mainly use it for business..."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not a drunk. I'm a police offi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not a drunk. I'm a police officer."
fields.Alternate1: "I'm not a drunk. I'm a police officer." (Wave around that big old bottle while you say it.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""How interesting." She turns to you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How interesting." She turns to you, unfazed. "I wish you a swift recovery. In the meanwhile, you have my *full* cooperation. And the full cooperation of the Wild Pines Group."

fields.Title: You: ""Cool.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cool."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "She's a professional *negotiator*...."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's a professional *negotiator*. She should be open to some sort of mutually beneficial arrangement..

fields.Title: Logic: "As the shipments approach Revachol?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As the shipments approach Revachol? Hmm... somehow you suspect something more *sinister*.

fields.Title: You: ""What exactly do they mean by it, t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What exactly do they mean by it, though? What's the demand?"

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Because it *stings*. In an ancient..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Because it *stings*. In an ancient and beautiful way.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She shakes her head vigorously. "My..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She shakes her head vigorously. "My plan is to share information. The only way to do that *now* is by telling my employers you've kept your end. Which I hope you will, because let me tell you: we are in *dire* waters."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. Exactly.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Exactly."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I wasn't the original negotiator h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wasn't the original negotiator here. I took over after Mr. Gaumont hit a wall with Mr. Claire, the Union boss. Mr. Claire refused to speak with Gaumont, despite *concessions* he'd granted the Union in prior negotiations."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course. To each their own.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. To each their own."

fields.Title: You: ""What happened then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happened then?"

fields.Title: You: ""Not a lot of people on boats, are..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not a lot of people on boats, are there?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes, we are." She raises her brow...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, we are." She raises her brow. "We are on Le Caillou."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course." She searches the pocke..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course." She searches the pockets of her raincoat, producing a bundle of documents in a sealed plastic bag.

fields.Title: You: ""How do you like it?" (Conclude.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "How do you like it?" (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Shivers: "A breeze ripples through the sails..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A breeze ripples through the sails and tugs at your hair. Below, the sleek, fishlike shape of the hull parts the water. Beneath that -- a resounding darkness. You're reminded of something, or some*one*...

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Your hand tires from making the mot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your hand tires from making the motion.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "It doesn't."
fields.Dialogue Text: It doesn't.

fields.Title: You: ""Fuck this, I'm outta here." [Leave..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck this, I'm outta here." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""Ma'am. You humiliated me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ma'am. You humiliated me."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""My mother had a stroke. She exhibi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My mother had a stroke. She exhibited similar problems -- although not *quite* like yours."

fields.Title: You: ""I called my station's lazareth and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I called my station's lazareth and they told me to 'drink less.'"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course." She passes the thermal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course." She passes the thermal cup between her gloved hands. "How else can I help?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Mr. Claire told him to, how did he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mr. Claire told him to, how did he put it?" She pauses to compose herself...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Why, thank you." She does not regi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why, thank you." She does not register the real meaning of the remark.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Before Martinaise was swallowed by..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Before Martinaise was swallowed by the industrial harbour, even before it was part of Revachol -- long before Terminal B was erected here -- the Pines built it as a resort for its Revacholian employees."

fields.Title: You: ""Really?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""Of course." She takes a sip from t..."]
Authority: "But she *knows* you're police."
fields.Dialogue Text: But she *knows* you're police.

fields.Title: Logic: "She must have been suspecting somet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She must have been suspecting something for a while now.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Officer..." The carbon fibre hull..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer..." The carbon fibre hull creaks.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "You're in, but expect her to drive..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're in, but expect her to drive a hard bargain.

fields.Title: You: ""Excuse us for a moment, madam." [L..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Excuse us for a moment, madam." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "A waft of flowers and caramel reach..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A waft of flowers and caramel reaches you where you're standing.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes -- and? Will you start an offi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- and? Will you start an official investigation?"

fields.Title: You: ""Let's call them strikebreakers --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's call them strikebreakers -- you put them there, right?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes. They were organized by Wild P..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. They were organized by Wild Pines. The contractors picked them up from Jamrock and drove them over. This is standard practice. The company reserves a right to man its stations."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""Of course." She makes a slight bow..."]
You: ""I need a *billion* reál.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need a *billion* reál."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""And even *if* I did I still would..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And even *if* I did I still would not give you ten thousand reál. I would rather buy something nice with it. Like expensive hi-fi or a new *Hydrodynamique E40* sail."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's quite the *phainómenon*, I ag..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's quite the *phainómenon*, I agree." She bows slightly. "Now how else can I help the RCM today, besides supplementing its salaries?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""This... *reality*?" She pulls her..."]
You: ""It seems the architect of the oper..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It seems the architect of the operation has gone missing. An abandoned lorry is near the statue."
fields.Alternate1: "It seems the architect of the operation is missing. An abandoned lorry is near the statue of Filippe, a FALN A-Z *Tempo*."

fields.Title: You: ""It was the nerve-center for the op..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was the nerve-center for the operation. She could contact a whole fleet of lorries."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Now they won't even let me into th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now they won't even let me into the harbour. There's a 2.20 m racist behemoth blocking the gates."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""We're in logistics. It's our busin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're in logistics. It's our business to know -- and no. As far as the company knows, the Union does not produce it. They transport the ingredients. For a cut."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "A striking woman leans against the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A striking woman leans against the cabin top of her sailing boat, smiling as you approach. Her green raincoat glistens with droplets, a silk scarf is tied around her throat.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's a medical thing. It's called...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a medical thing. It's called... *old*. I'm old you see."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "A smirk passes her face. "I think I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A smirk passes her face. "I think I'll stick with the factory name. But thank you."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "A... billion?"
fields.Dialogue Text: A... billion?

fields.Title: You: ""Not *hard communist* enough for me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not *hard communist* enough for me."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She removes a few notes and hands t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She removes a few notes and hands them to you. The paper is cold and oily to the touch.

fields.Title: Authority: "You don't have to tell her you met..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You don't have to tell her you met Evrart *right away*. There's time.

fields.Title: Logic: "Let's be honest, you have no idea w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let's be honest, you have no idea what that meant -- interisolary microwave compression? Moving on...

fields.Title: Logic: "Didn't Titus mention that Ruby ran..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Didn't Titus mention that Ruby ran a *complex operation* out of her lorry? Could it be connected? Only one way to find out -- investigate!

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm glad to see you here." The wom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm glad to see you here." The woman and the lieutenant exchange a brief handshake.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I arrived three weeks ago..." She..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I arrived three weeks ago..." She thinks. "Yes, in the middle of February -- the bay was still partially frozen then. I prefer to do these things on-site. Like the RCM."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "She hasn't actually said it to ever..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She hasn't actually said it to every drunk in town. It was spoken in jest.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Funny, I could think of a few ways..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Funny, I could think of a few ways to dispute them." She pauses. "But we digress."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She nods politely. "Of course. Any..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She nods politely. "Of course. Any more questions about the boat, sir?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You have the guns and the ammo! Tak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You have the guns and the ammo! Take this *klassenfeind* down!
fields.Alternate1: Before you do -- it would be pertinent to ask other questions. Gather more info on this *boat* of hers...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Think nothing of it, officer." She..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Think nothing of it, officer." She runs her hand along the fibreglass cabin. "What's a little *class conflict* between friends?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You mean *eel's hips* -- but point..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean *eel's hips* -- but point taken. I am a bourgeois woman and this is my fast, light, interminably bourgeois boat."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""My..." she inspects the motion. "I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My..." she inspects the motion. "It's as if there is *a tiny spinner* on the side of his head, and he's *reeling* thoughts out."

fields.Title: You: "Keep waving your hand, slowly."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep waving your hand, slowly.

fields.Title: You: ""What were we talking about anyway?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What were we talking about anyway?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Good luck -- It's only kept in pla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good luck -- It's only kept in place by the vested interests of half the civilized world, including your own."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""But -- I am derailing us. You want..."]
Joyce Messier: ""Fortunately they explained it. Eve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fortunately they explained it. Every time the Wild Pines Group makes a decision -- about *anything* -- it needs the signature of *each* of the 2,200 workers in its Martinaise terminal."

fields.Title: You: ""Oh, yeah. That's a good one.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, yeah. That's a good one."

fields.Title: You: ""That's pretty funny, I have to adm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's pretty funny, I have to admit."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""What *we* do -- I'm afraid I don't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What *we* do -- I'm afraid I don't speak for Wild Pines as a whole. It's a giant undertaking."

fields.Title: You: ""What does such a huge system want..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What does such a huge system want with a place like this?" (Look around.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She nods, forcefully: "There are no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She nods, forcefully: "There are no minor cogs in the system. Each terminal must be accounted for, lest the entire system break. Every hiccup in such a system means thousands lose their jobs -- the world over. I'm here to assure that doesn't happen."

fields.Title: You: ""He's not *that* bad.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "He's not *that* bad."

fields.Title: You: ""Sounds like they're All-Revachol...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds like they're All-Revachol. I'm All-Revachol, too. To hell with the rest."

fields.Title: You: ""I've recently suffered from an *un..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've recently suffered from an *unusual* medical episode. My lost badge is related to it."
fields.Alternate1: "Remember when my partner told you I'd recently suffered from an *unusual* medical episode? My lost badge is related to it."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I *do* believe you -- naive as tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I *do* believe you -- naive as that may sound. I simply can't imagine what you'd gain by *faking* such a condition."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "I mean favours for favours. A *dirt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I mean favours for favours. A *dirty* alliance of some sort.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes. But you won't get anything ou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. But you won't get anything out of Evrart and the Dockworkers' Union. Still --" she raises her bony finger, "every chain has its weak link."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""This is a limited-time opportunity..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is a limited-time opportunity. Once the complaint has been processed by the trade committee they'll have no choice but to lower the drawbridge -- and the operation will continue." She looks north.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Thousands of litres of raw ingredi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thousands of litres of raw ingredients will pour onto the streets of Revachol. Not the East, across the river, but the West. The vulnerable, the weary..."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "It sounds like she tried looking in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It sounds like she tried looking into it herself, though she's clearly not the type your typical lorryman would confide in.

fields.Title: Empathy: "She's trying to conceal her excitem..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's trying to conceal her excitement, but the slight glimmer in her green eyes tells you otherwise.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Okay. I thank you for sharing that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. I thank you for sharing that much with me." She exhales, as though a weight has been lifted from her shoulders. "My employer thanks you as well..."

fields.Title: You: "Let the lieutenant handle it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let the lieutenant handle it.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Don't let her answer it herself."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't let her answer it herself.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "...is what you *want* to say. But i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...is what you *want* to say. But it isn't that easy, is it?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Look at that lady. Take a *gander*...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at that lady. Take a *gander*. Squint your eyes, bub.

fields.Title: You: ""I am the scum of the earth.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am the scum of the earth."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That's a good sum -- not too small..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a good sum -- not too small, not fantastically large." She reaches into her raincoat and pulls out a zip bag -- in it you see paper notes arranged like black gills.
fields.Alternate1: "That's a good sum. Not too small, not fantastically large like a billion." She reaches into her raincoat and pulls out a zip bag made of see-through plastic.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Which he most certainly will do."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Which he most certainly will do." She bows, and then raises a single eyebrow in your direction: "Now, how else can I help the RCM today, besides supplementing its salaries?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's stone-like face re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's stone-like face remains impassive, yet in his eyes -- a flash of reproach.

fields.Title: You: ""I could've eaten it for all I know..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I could've eaten it for all I know. I don't remember anything. This world, this city. Nothing."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No matter, detective. We're losing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No matter, detective. We're losing the thread again."

fields.Title: You: ""Eerie.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Eerie."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: "The woman is tying a complicated na..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well -- at least this solves *one*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well -- at least this solves *one* mystery."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "... they're profiting from this tra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ... they're profiting from this trade.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I can't see why it *wouldn't* be o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't see why it *wouldn't* be okay. Now, what can I do for you?"

fields.Title: You: ""I don't seem to have my badge, act..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't seem to have my badge, actually..."

fields.Title: You: ""My badge. Yes. Of course. My badge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My badge. Yes. Of course. My badge that I have on me."

fields.Title: Empathy: "She is unfazed by your rudeness, pr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She is unfazed by your rudeness, probably chocking it up to local custom.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes -- Jean-Luc *Measurehead*." Sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- Jean-Luc *Measurehead*." She leans back and rolls her eyes.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She nods attentively."
fields.Dialogue Text: She nods attentively.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Officer, I assure you I'm a highly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer, I assure you I'm a highly qualified pleasure craft operator."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, exactly how little known is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, exactly how little known is this fact?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. I'm going to need to see your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. I'm going to need to see your passport."

fields.Title: You: ""Everything appears to be in order...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everything appears to be in order." (Give the documents back.)

fields.Title: You: ""Makes sense, I guess. I mean, look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Makes sense, I guess. I mean, look at me."

fields.Title: You: ""More like Anarchy Act in my opinio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "More like Anarchy Act in my opinion."

fields.Title: Empathy: "There's a trace of irony in his voi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a trace of irony in his voice. Mischief even. The lieutenant is hatching some scheme.

fields.Title: You: ""Any moment.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Any moment."

fields.Title: Volition: "You're being handled. Don't stand f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're being handled. Don't stand for it.

fields.Title: You: ""Huh, what do you mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Huh, what do you mean?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Drinking less sounds like a great..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Drinking less sounds like a great start!" She nods approvingly, but without condescension. "Go on -- you have my full cooperation."

fields.Title: You: ""No one lives forever, baby.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No one lives forever, baby."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I am glad you see it that way. To..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am glad you see it that way. To repeal the act would mean *repealing* the Coalition government. The one that leases you the right to police West Revachol..."

fields.Title: You: ""Hmh. Okay then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmh. Okay then."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Personally, I agree -- It lacks th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Personally, I agree -- It lacks the *pizzazzo* of *EVERY WORKER -- A MEMBER OF THE BOARD*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Excuse me," the lieutenant looks u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Excuse me," the lieutenant looks up from his notes, "From whom did you *hear* about this lynching?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The Wild Pines Group is one of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Wild Pines Group is one of the original Revacholian *indotribes* -- companies awarded royal monopolies by the king (the suzerain) himself, centuries ago. The king is long gone, but several of the indotribes remain.

fields.Title: You: ""I remember hearing something about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I remember hearing something about this Edgar."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "What she calls *corruption* is simp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What she calls *corruption* is simply an aesthetic category.

fields.Title: You: ""Talking in aesthetic categories is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Talking in aesthetic categories is the privilege of the overclass. From what I've seen -- most people are just trying to survive."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Worry lines crease her forehead, bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Worry lines crease her forehead, but it's more than worry. In her eyes, a hint of... is that *guilt*?

fields.Title: You: ""Why is this necessary?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why is this necessary?"

fields.Title: Logic: "The hand-off. The motor lorries at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The hand-off. The motor lorries at the roundabout.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""How do you think they're financing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How do you think they're financing this strike? There are thousands of unpaid dockworkers going strong for the fourth month straight."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Or not -- though if you have evide..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Or not -- though if you have evidence to the contrary I'm *eager* to hear it."

fields.Title: You: ""YOU SEEM RICH. CAN I HAVE SOME MON..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "YOU SEEM RICH. CAN I HAVE SOME MONEY?"

fields.Title: You: ""Oops, I must have misheard.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oops, I must have misheard."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That was the annual revenue of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That was the annual revenue of the *entire* Wild Pines Group, not my personal fortune..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It is. Fast and silent." She gives..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It is. Fast and silent." She gives you a crooked little smile. "Try again, but lower."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She removes a few notes and hands t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She removes a few notes and hands them to you. The paper is cold and oily to the touch.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That's a good sum -- not too small..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a good sum -- not too small, not fantastically large." She reaches into her raincoat and pulls out a zip bag -- in it you see paper notes arranged like black gills.
fields.Alternate1: "That's a good sum. Not too small, not fantastically large like a billion." She reaches into her raincoat and pulls out a zip bag made of see-through plastic.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She hands it back to you. "Pleased..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She hands it back to you. "Pleased to meet you, Lieutenant Double-Yefreitor Du Bois. I am glad to see a man of high qualification -- the situation is precarious."

fields.Title: You: ""A seriously bad guy. I might even..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A seriously bad guy. I might even be on his take!"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""We contain multitudes, do we not?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We contain multitudes, do we not? It might not be pertinent to her... *profession*, but who knows? It may help you find her yet."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*EVERY WORKER -- A MEMBER OF THE B..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*EVERY WORKER -- A MEMBER OF THE BOARD!*"

fields.Title: You: ""How about the *Sleek Fish*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How about the *Sleek Fish*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm not really *big* on moralist s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not really *big* on moralist symbols. I think I'll stick with the factory name. But thank you."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You're back. Good." She takes a si..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're back. Good." She takes a sip from her silvery thermal cup. "What can I help you with -- at this late hour?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course."

fields.Title: Authority: "Sounds like usual aggressive postur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sounds like usual aggressive posturing.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: "She smiles. "Watch out for yourself..."]
Rhetoric: "She's not actually considering it...."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's not actually considering it. It's sarcasm.

fields.Title: Drama: "Everyone *knows* you can't trust ar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Everyone *knows* you can't trust artists. They're nearly as bad as *clowns*.

fields.Title: Drama: "Unbelievable, sire. Even the *arlec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unbelievable, sire. Even the *arlecchinos* didn't work.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Yes. You're too ashamed to ask this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. You're too ashamed to ask this person for *money*, too scared to belittle yourself in her eyes -- those half-precious stones of Eau-de-Nil.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "This checks out."
fields.Dialogue Text: This checks out.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You're back. Good." She looks at t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're back. Good." She looks at the ripples on the water's surface. "What can I help you with -- not an umbrella, I hope. I don't need one myself, you see..." She pats her wet raincoat.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's for crossing long distances i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's for crossing long distances in the Greater Revachol Industrial Harbour. It's not a toy."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Surely you're aware that under the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Surely you're aware that under the Wayfarer Act the RCM doesn't have the authority to demand anyone's operator license. Freedom of movement and all that."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You *need* to make this lady admit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You *need* to make this lady admit she's only riding around on this boat because she's rich.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Why what? Stop thinking. Take her d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why what? Stop thinking. Take her down.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Yup. That's the stuff."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yup. That's the stuff.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""No worries." She takes another sip..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No worries." She takes another sip. "We can just go back to discussing my fast, large, interminably middle class boat."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Lieutenant, I truly don't understa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant, I truly don't understand what is happening here."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""First you'd have to repeal the Eme..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "First you'd have to repeal the Emergencies Act of Trade and Aliments that gives me the right to silence. It's quite the octopus."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She nods: "I hope I can be of help...."
fields.Dialogue Text: She nods: "I hope I can be of help."

fields.Title: You: ""Wouldn't want to disturb an octopu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wouldn't want to disturb an octopus. Better let it be."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""Fortunately they explained it. Eve..."]
You: ""Forget it. I wanted to ask somethi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Forget it. I wanted to ask something else about the strike."

fields.Title: You: ""That's all I needed to know -- abo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's all I needed to know -- about something else..."

fields.Title: You: ""That's not what you really think,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's not what you really think, right?

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes. Edgar looks *exactly* like hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Edgar looks *exactly* like his brother, except for that lazy eye. He also *talks* exactly like Evrart does. And when one's term as foreman is up, the other takes over."

fields.Title: You: ""You sound like you're about to tak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You sound like you're about to take a rapier to him."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh heavens no! We get along just f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh heavens no! We get along just fine... Yet now that you mention it, I can't stop imagining that black treacle... Just dribbling down his double chin..." She stops and smiles.

fields.Title: You: ""An effective advocate for the righ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "An effective advocate for the rights of local workingmen."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Well..." She looks across the bay,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well..." She looks across the bay, trying to find the words. "I suppose that's *one* way to look at it -- they're an interesting composition, albeit vile. But enough about Evrart -- what else can I do for you?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I just can't go around telling con..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I just can't go around telling confidential information to strangers. I've signed a contract."

fields.Title: Logic: "She's memorizing your badge number."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's memorizing your badge number.

fields.Title: You: ""Surely there's some other way to d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Surely there's some other way to demonstrate my law enforcement credentials."
fields.Alternate1: "Surely there's some other way to demonstrate our law enforcement credentials?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""In the meantime, I'll still try to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In the meantime, I'll still try to assist you any way I can. This disagreement is peanuts compared to what happens if you fail your main investigation."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""On the contrary, officer," she smi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "On the contrary, officer," she smiles. "There are yet camionneurs you have not talked to. And don't look so surprised. In a time like this it would be strange if Wild Pines *didn't* have eyes on the harbour."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, where exactly are these *eye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, where exactly are these *eyes* located?"

fields.Title: Authority: "The lieutenant is about to interjec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is about to interject. Cut him off. This decision should be yours.

fields.Title: You: ""You're right, I don't know what go..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, I don't know what got into me. Some of that degenerate dock worker lingo has rubbed off, it seems."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ha!" She gives you a crooked smile..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ha!" She gives you a crooked smile. "If the workers were organized by Wild Pines then it would be a company secret. I could not share it with you  -- not yet, at least..."

fields.Title: You: ""Fine, let's return to it later.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine, let's return to it later."

fields.Title: Composure: "Positively statuesque."
fields.Dialogue Text: Positively statuesque.

fields.Title: Logic: "...within reason."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...within reason.

fields.Title: Volition: "I am sorry. It just doesn't come ou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I am sorry. It just doesn't come out of your mouth. What does is:

fields.Title: You: ""No I'm not. I'm gunk.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No I'm not. I'm gunk."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Why yes, I am rich. How much money..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why yes, I am rich. How much money do you need? Hopefully not too much, I couldn't bring all of it with me."

fields.Title: You: ""I need 1 reál.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need 1 reál."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "Seaweed drips from the badge in you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Seaweed drips from the badge in your hand. It smells of fish. "What can I help you with, lieutenant-yefreitor?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ah, good to hear. I wouldn't want..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, good to hear. I wouldn't want to pry into a confidential police matter. But, in the event you'd like to share more... I *would* like to know who it was."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The company has tried looking into..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The company has tried looking into this matter before -- to no avail. Perhaps someone with *your* authority and resources might turn over the right stones?"

fields.Title: You: ""After Her Innocence Dolores Dei.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "After Her Innocence Dolores Dei."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Good morning, officers. I'm Joyce...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good morning, officers. I'm Joyce." She extends her hand in greeting.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I almost never sleep anymore... if..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I almost never sleep anymore... if I do it's for an hour, four tops" She suppresses a yawn. "Go ahead -- ask me some questions. They are the *only* cure."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Her smile is bitter. There is no cu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her smile is bitter. There is no cure.

fields.Title: You: ""Sail away.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sail away."

fields.Title: Drama: "No way. She's more. She can make de..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No way. She's more. She can make decisions.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course. I sympathize. But I'm a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. I sympathize. But I'm afraid I simply can't share anything more until I've seen that badge..."

fields.Title: You: ""Like what?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like what?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Her nonchalance *might* be related..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her nonchalance *might* be related to something called the Wayfarer Act -- a law that says she doesn't *need* a licence. Sly fox... you're not aggressive enough to harass her further on this.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes. After they clear the terminal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. After they clear the terminal we lose track. The actual production is taking place at various sites in and around Jamrock Quarter. North of here."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And this is my colleague from Prec..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And this is my colleague from Precinct 41, Detective Du Bois." He waits for you to show your badge.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Be very careful, what information y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Be very careful, what information you're gonna share with her.

fields.Title: You: ""You're on a boat.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're on a boat."
fields.Alternate1: "Let's talk some more about this *boat* that you're on."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""They're *nonsense*, a load of trip..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They're *nonsense*, a load of tripe." She tosses back her hair. "But we were on the subject of the talks I believe."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, we're on an *archipelago*?"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, we're on an *archipelago*?" (Look around.)

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "The crowns of her teeth are porcela..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The crowns of her teeth are porcelain, white as the boat's hull as she smiles.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need to resort to self pity, de..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No need to resort to self pity, detective. You can still ask for her passport."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Why wouldn't it be? This is Revach..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why wouldn't it be? This is Revachol. Wayfarer act and all. *Anyone* can drive a boat."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She nods and returns the plastic ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She nods and returns the plastic bag to her coat.

fields.Title: You: ""You're from Vesper?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're from Vesper?"
fields.Alternate1: "You're from the Republic of Vesper."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""My husband is. I have dual citizen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My husband is. I have dual citizenship. A Vespertine is handier when travelling."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Empathy: "There is no shame in her voice -- a..."]
Joyce Messier: ""Oh no..." Her eyes turn large and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh no..." Her eyes turn large and round...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It was *quite* a while ago, but I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was *quite* a while ago, but I think..." she looks around. "Yes. We were discussing my fast, large, ineluctably middle class boat."

fields.Title: You: ""What situation? I don't remember a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What situation? I don't remember any situation."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Why, by throwing off half a centur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why, by throwing off half a century of foreign domination under the Coalition! Unfortunately for you, the Coalition also leases you the right to police West Revachol..."

fields.Title: You: ""I like it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I like it."

fields.Title: You: ""What does that even mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What does that even mean?"

fields.Title: You: ""Over-aggressive commie posturing.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Over-aggressive commie posturing."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Saint-Batiste, LUM, an unknown enti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Saint-Batiste, LUM, an unknown entity known as Brightest Star...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm not at liberty to discuss the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not at liberty to discuss the company balance sheet, but I *can* tell you that last year the company booked more than 20 billion reál in revenue."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's a number, officer, a *big* on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a number, officer, a *big* one."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Wild Pines employs 72,000 people,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wild Pines employs 72,000 people, all of whom have families that depend on their salaries. It is a tremendous responsibility."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, there are *two* of him?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, there are *two* of him?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A mob," the lieutenant says succin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A mob," the lieutenant says succinctly. "The Débardeurs are a crime syndicate. Sad as it may be, we're forced to cooperate with them."
fields.Alternate1: "A mob," the lieutenant says succinctly. "The Débardeurs are a crime syndicate. Sad as it may be, I suspect we'll be forced to cooperate with them."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Or a mob." She nods. "Sadly, Wild..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Or a mob." She nods. "Sadly, Wild Pines have cooperated with what amounts to a crime syndicate for two decades. However much you feed the wolf -- the wolf always hungers."
fields.Alternate1: "Indeed. And a hungry one." She nods. "Sadly, Wild Pines have cooperated with what amounts to a crime syndicate for two decades. However much you feed the leech -- the leech always hungers."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ha!" She throws her hair back. "A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ha!" She throws her hair back. "A real Man of the Left. What else can I tell you about?"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm Lieutenant Double-Yefreitor Ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm Lieutenant Double-Yefreitor Harrier Du Bois, from Precinct 41." (Give her your badge.)

fields.Title: Empathy: "Awkwardness washes over the convers..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Awkwardness washes over the conversation. The woman doesn't like this turn of events.

fields.Title: Drama: "'Twas stolen by some *artist*, sure..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 'Twas stolen by some *artist*, surely. Best to pin the blame on them. Everyone *knows* you can't trust artists.

fields.Title: You: ""I wish it were.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wish it were."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm afraid not, lieutenant. These..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid not, lieutenant. These are my employer's orders..."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Hang on, she's a professional *nego..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hang on, she's a professional *negotiator*. She should be open to some sort of mutually beneficial arrangement.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Wait! She just admitted that the ly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait! She just admitted that the lynching and the strike are connected.

fields.Title: You: ""The lorries.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The lorries."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""We *did*, on more than one occasio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We *did*, on more than one occasion. Apparently there's some sort of inter-precinct disagreement about whose jurisdiction this area falls under."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We know the company has launched i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We know the company has launched its own probe into the Union's alleged involvement -- we also know it's come up empty. It's not just the RCM -- *no one's* been able to find any hard evidence."

fields.Title: You: ""I've heard they shook down local b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've heard they shook down local business owners. Drove a few out of business to finance it."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The two *might* even be connected.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The two *might* even be connected."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Until you come up with something a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Until you come up with something at that intersection I'm afraid I have little else to tell you -- but I'll try. Ask."

fields.Title: You: ""I spoke with the lorrymen at the r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I spoke with the lorrymen at the roundabout."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I've kept my eye on the camionneur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've kept my eye on the camionneurs -- even tried to get to know one. It's a *mystery* I'm already invested in: which one of them, if any, could organize such a complex operation?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""If they were organized by Wild Pin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If they were organized by Wild Pines or its affiliates then it would be a company secret. I could not share it with you -- not right now at least..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Better not to tie the forestay to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Better not to tie the forestay to the backstay on this. I hope there is something else I can help you with?"

fields.Title: You: "What is this feeling? I've never fe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What is this feeling? I've never felt it before.

fields.Title: You: ""Money...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Money..."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm gunk.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm gunk."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""No, you don't. One reál won't get..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, you don't. One reál won't get you two pieces of bath tissue to rub together."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""So," she returns the zip bag to he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So," she returns the zip bag to her jacket. "I hope I didn't just *bribe* you, officer. It may not be technically *illegal* under the Emergency Act, but still..."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""Of course." She takes a sip from t..."]
You: ""She's a fan of vintage movie stars..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She's a fan of vintage movie stars. The inside of the cab was plastered with posters."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""I wouldn't normally break protocol..."]
Joyce Messier: ""I suggest you go back and canvas f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I suggest you go back and canvas for more suspects."

fields.Title: You: ""It's night. Don't you ever sleep?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's night. Don't you ever sleep?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Thank you -- I do what I can to re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you -- I do what I can to remain presentable. Now, ask me some questions. It'll help us pass the night."

fields.Title: You: ""Disappeared?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Disappeared?"
fields.Alternate1: "I heard something strange happened to her..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm afraid I can't say any more un..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid I can't say any more until we've taken care of formal protocol."

fields.Title: You: "Ashamed?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Ashamed?

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh no -- not a problem at all.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh no -- not a problem at all."

fields.Title: Composure: "It truly isn't. She controls hersel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It truly isn't. She controls herself very well.

fields.Title: You: ""Uhm... yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uhm... yes."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The goal posts have moved, lieuten..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The goal posts have moved, lieutenant. In the absence of the badge I have informed my employer there will be a probe."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Technically, the neighbouring Ozonn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Technically, the neighbouring Ozonne and Face-à-La-Mer island groups are archipelagos, while Le Caillou, by contrast, is a single, fertile land mass, the fourth largest island in the world. It is not an archipelago.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Okay." She gives you a crooked smi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay." She gives you a crooked smile. "If you want to get technical. The point is we're *all* on islands here. And sail is still the most expedient way to get from one island to another. Especially when you're in a hurry to resolve a *strike*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Pardon me, it's not especially rel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pardon me, it's not especially relevant."

fields.Title: You: "*Yawn*"
fields.Dialogue Text: *Yawn*

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "The word *it* feels strange. Such a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The word *it* feels strange. Such a beautiful boat deserves a proper name...

fields.Title: You: ""I'm pretty sure I do. I police.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm pretty sure I do. I police."

fields.Title: You: ""Forget about it. I was out of line.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Forget about it. I was out of line."

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing is going to come." (Give u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing is going to come." (Give up.)

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, I *might* have suffered..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, I *might* have suffered a stroke. I'm not sure."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course." She slightly bows her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course." She slightly bows her head. "Please accept my apologies. What can I help you with?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""If you have doubts about your brai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you have doubts about your brain's blood supply, well... that's what we call a serious matter."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Everything." She smiles. "Right up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everything." She smiles. "Right up to -- but not including -- *trade secrets*."

fields.Title: You: ""How do I repeal it then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How do I repeal it then?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""There are leaflets everywhere, and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There are leaflets everywhere, and banners... what did they say again? Oh, yes..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I first heard it from the *boia* a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I first heard it from the *boia* at the gates,” her reply comes quick, “the one who's very name advertises his aversion to work. I think he said it was *Call Me Mañana*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Twenty billion is a large number,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Twenty billion is a large number, but the conglomerate employs 72,000 people. They all need to be paid. Then there are capital improvements, interest payments..." A wave hits the sloop, she grasps the mainstay for balance.
fields.Alternate1: "Twenty two billion is a large number, but consider this -- the conglomerate employs 72,000 people. They all need wages..." She turns her eyes towards the wave rising against the sloop.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "*We* -- there it is. She owns up to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *We* -- there it is. She owns up to it.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Thank you for being candid," she n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you for being candid," she nods. "Sadly, Wild Pines have cooperated with what amounts to a crime syndicate for two decades. However much you feed the wolf -- the wolf always hungers."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Quite a few things, I'm afraid..."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Quite a few things, I'm afraid..." She falls silent for a moment. Contemplating something.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""How can I forget?" She tilts her h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How can I forget?" She tilts her head to the side.

fields.Title: You: ""But, madam, I need to know about t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But, madam, I need to know about this lynching. It's *very* important to me. It's the case I'm solving."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ingredients for *what*, ma'am?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ingredients for *what*, ma'am?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "How convenient that they're strande..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How convenient that they're stranded like beached whales at that roundabout.

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, let's discuss something..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, let's discuss something else for now."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Well," she smiles and points towar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well," she smiles and points toward the roundabout, "here's your chance, officers."

fields.Title: Shivers: "A cold breath rushes in from the ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A cold breath rushes in from the bay, making its way down the alleyways and potholed streets -- from Martinaise to Jamrock. In the traffic you hear the clinking of glass vials, concealed beneath tarpaulin. Or is it just your teeth chattering in the cold?

fields.Title: You: "(Shiver.) "Fucking misery.""
fields.Dialogue Text: (Shiver.) "Fucking misery."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The lorries are still stuck at the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The lorries are still stuck at the roundabout -- if the police is asking, one of the drivers might admit to it."

fields.Title: You: ""We already have some suspicions th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We already have some suspicions that one of the drivers was present at the lynching."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""In any case, it's a relief to know..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In any case, it's a relief to know someone has looked into it. If I may ask -- will there be an official investigation? I assume you discovered there *is* an operation..."

fields.Title: You: ""Hold on, you seem anxious to know...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hold on, you seem anxious to know. Why's that?"

fields.Title: You: "Yes -- I should decide."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes -- I should decide.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: "She reaches for the photo; takes it..."]
You: ""So you know something about the ta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you know something about the tattoos?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "She understands what you're trying..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She understands what you're trying to do -- ask for money. But shame is contagious and she doesn't want to offend you by saying it out loud.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ah yes, of course, I'm sad to hear..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah yes, of course, I'm sad to hear that." She nods, as if its self explanatory. "How much do you need?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Excuse me sir, I don't have a bill..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Excuse me sir, I don't have a billion reál."

fields.Title: You: ""Hi-fi? I like high fidelity disco..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hi-fi? I like high fidelity disco music too."
