fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She removes a few notes and hands t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She removes a few notes and hands them to you. The paper is cold and oily to the touch.

fields.Title: You: ""Certainly not. I am an *honourable..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Certainly not. I am an *honourable* policeman."
fields.Alternate1: "I am an *honourable* policeman. One of the few good men in Revachol."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course." She bows slightly. "No..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course." She bows slightly. "Now how else can I help the RCM today, besides supplementing its salaries?"

fields.Title: You: ""By the way, I've talked to Evrart..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "By the way, I've talked to Evrart Claire."
fields.Alternate1: "So I've been dealing with Evrart again..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Nevertheless, he sounds *terribly*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nevertheless, he sounds *terribly* dangerous. I urge you to take care, officer. I wouldn't want anything to happen to you."

fields.Title: You: ""That's not really my area. I just..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's not really my area. I just want to get to the bottom of this."
fields.Alternate1: "All this talk about *jurisdictions* is really cramping my style. I just want to get to the bottom of this."

fields.Title: You: ""Am I going to need bolt cutters fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Am I going to need bolt cutters for this?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Good evening, officers, I'm Joyce...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good evening, officers, I'm Joyce." She extends her hand in greeting.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I have a medical condition of my o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have a medical condition of my own -- nothing unusual, though. I'm *old* you see."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Didn't she have *another* medical c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Didn't she have *another* medical condition?

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "This *forewoman* -- her name?"
fields.Dialogue Text: This *forewoman* -- her name?

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""33A -- this old *proletarian* haun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "33A -- this old *proletarian* haunt here." She waves at the ruin looming overhead. "As I said, *plenty* of people drive boats. Of all social strata."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*Or* you can find your badge, whic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Or* you can find your badge, which, honestly, seems like a lost cause."

fields.Title: You: ""It's a she, by the way.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a she, by the way."

fields.Title: Authority: "She's having a good time arguing ag..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's having a good time arguing against the law. Too good, perhaps?

fields.Title: You: ""Better not to frighten you, ma'am.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Better not to frighten you, ma'am."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He looks at you expectantly. Then i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He looks at you expectantly. Then it dawns on him...

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you. That's all for now." [L..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you. That's all for now." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""What gave me away?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What gave me away?"
fields.Alternate1: "What gave us away?"

fields.Title: You: ""How were the talks going before th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How were the talks going before the lynching?" (Proceed.)

fields.Title: You: ""Uhm, Caillou? I thought we were in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uhm, Caillou? I thought we were in Revachol."

fields.Title: You: ""What do you mean -- archipelago?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean -- archipelago?"

fields.Title: You: ""Can I see your licence?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can I see your licence?"

fields.Title: You: ""Still *need* to see a license, ma'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Still *need* to see a license, ma'am."

fields.Title: You: ""So we *can't* pull over random civ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So we *can't* pull over random civilians and demand their papers? That's weak."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You may still ask for my passport...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You may still ask for my passport." She strikes a reconciliatory tone...

fields.Title: You: "Yes, I do!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, I do!

fields.Title: You: ""It's gonna happen.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's gonna happen."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A stroke could partially explain t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A stroke could partially explain the *memory trouble* you've been experiencing."

fields.Title: Logic: "You'd be shooting yourself in the f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You'd be shooting yourself in the foot, in other words.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I imagine a man like you can take..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I imagine a man like you can take quite the *lashing*." She sizes you up. "But I believe we were talking about the *strike*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm not sure. Naturally I assumed..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not sure. Naturally I assumed that was just their opening position, a hard-nosed tactic with a side of mockery. But there's been no follow up, just the same nonsensical slogan repeated over and over again..."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: You: ""Let's take this back to the strike.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's take this back to the strike."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Empathy: "Awkwardness washes over the convers..."]
You: ""Perhaps it is. But it's also true..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perhaps it is. But it's also true that I don't remember where my badge is."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You mean someone *stole* your badg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean someone *stole* your badge?" Her brow is slightly arched.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh, *dear*..." she sighs with conf..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, *dear*..." she sighs with confusion, sadness even. "Some kind of encephalopathic amnesia? I don't even know how to respond..."

fields.Title: You: "How do I negotiate my way out of th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How do I negotiate my way out of this?

fields.Title: You: ""So you think the strike is being f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you think the strike is being funded with source ingredients for drugs?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes, my eyes on the harbour have s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, my eyes on the harbour have sent word to that effect -- what have you discovered?"

fields.Title: Authority: "Exactly -- but what?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Exactly -- but what?

fields.Title: You: ""The scabs at the gate -- did you p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The scabs at the gate -- did you put them there?"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["gates.scableader_greeting_done"]  or  Variable["gates.manana_greeting_done"]  or  Variable["gates.manana_shortgreet"]  or  Variable["auto.visited_gates"]

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course," her back straightens...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course," her back straightens. "Anything to help."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*Joyce* is much more efficient.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Joyce* is much more efficient."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "These are the kind eyes of the rich..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These are the kind eyes of the rich-man, that seem to say: everything is possible...

fields.Title: You: "Yeah, so?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, so?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Now look at you, you misery-clad si..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now look at you, you misery-clad simian, barely able to tie your own laces. Your armpits are lakes, a scythe of booze precedes you. Your hair sticks to your forehead and your underwear feels uncomfortable...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Shame? You haven't really been in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shame? You haven't really been in the presence of gentlefolk either, have you? What shame is there to be felt in front of these... dockworkers, cops and hotel clerks. But to *belittle* yourself in these eyes of Eau-de-Nil...

fields.Title: You: "I'm a god damn working man, I'm not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm a god damn working man, I'm not *ashamed* to shake this leech for some dough.

fields.Title: Authority: "Oh god, the lieutenant is here too!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh god, the lieutenant is here too! Do not DISHONOUR the force!

fields.Title: Volition: "Voila, you're doing it!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Voila, you're doing it!

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I like high fidelity *anything*, s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I like high fidelity *anything*, sir." She gives you a fast little smile. "Now try again, but lower."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""So," she returns the zip bag to he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So," she returns the zip bag to her jacket. "I hope I didn't just *bribe* you, officer. It may not be technically *illegal* under the Emergency Act, but still..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Au contraire, officer. I also feel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Au contraire, officer. I also feel queasy about the pittance the Coalition calls your salary. Now is there something else I can do for you, or did you want to chat about *dialectics* some more?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""What would you like to know?" She..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What would you like to know?" She taps her foot on the deck.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""High intensity microwave frequenci..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "High intensity microwave frequencies? They're used for navigational purposes, to compress the interisolary space. They may use it to communicate with incoming freighters..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You know..." she puts her foot on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know..." she puts her foot on the guardwire. "I don't mean to sound cold, but if you want something, you have to give something back. *More* than just guilt."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Unlikely, officer. I'm talking abo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Unlikely, officer. I'm talking about the lorries. Once the ingredients reach Jamrock they're distributed to a network of local manufacturers, well beyond our grasp. But in transit they may be *vulnerable*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Excellent." She takes a long sip o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Excellent." She takes a long sip of tea. "According to my reports there are at least three lorry drivers lingering near the roundabout. Hopefully one of them will know something."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""I'll just keep the Cor-de-Leite in..."]
Esprit de Corps: "I really do, the lieutenant thinks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I really do, the lieutenant thinks -- is she thrown off, yet? He's looking at the woman, assessing her...

fields.Title: You: ""*Not* cool.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Not* cool."

fields.Title: You: ""Fair, I guess. The probe will be d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fair, I guess. The probe will be done soon."

fields.Title: Half Light: "The words *blood bath* sound cold i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The words *blood bath* sound cold in her mouth. They taste of iron and strawberries.

fields.Title: You: ""Precisomundo. Class war time baby.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Precisomundo. Class war time baby."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "A fleet? Three shabby fishing boats..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A fleet? Three shabby fishing boats is hardly a *fleet*.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""How curious." She returns the lieu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How curious." She returns the lieutenant's badge and turns to you. "Why is that, detective?"
fields.Alternate1: "More curious by the minute..." She returns the lieutenant's badge turns to you. "Why is that, detective?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The Republic of Vesper, formerly th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Republic of Vesper, formerly the Republic of Vesper-Messina, was once a dual kingdom. An amicable parting of ways produced two constitutional monarchies. Vesper, the richer of the two, is an Occidental nation known for its proximity to the pale and its exotic financial derivatives.

fields.Title: You: ""What do you mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh my, the *E-word*." She crosses..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh my, the *E-word*." She crosses her arms. "You mean to say that it's a symbol of *conspicuous consumption*? That I'm a member of the ruling class."

fields.Title: You: ""There doesn't seem to be much spac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There doesn't seem to be much space left with this giant pleasure craft docked in the way."
fields.Alternate1: "There doesn't seem to be much space left with this 19-pace sloop docked here."

fields.Title: You: ""No problem, let's resume normal, p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No problem, let's resume normal, professional relations."

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me about Wild Pines. What do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me about Wild Pines. What do you do?"

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know what to think about t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know what to think about that."

fields.Title: Logic: "Most of the workers probably don't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Most of the workers probably don't know what that means.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "...then to the east, toward the har..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...then to the east, toward the harbour: "And that is the terminal. Another subdivision deals with energy -- oil and gas exploration. Offshore platforms."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""Of course." She takes a sip from t..."]
Joyce Messier: ""Trust me, officer, I am *fully com..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Trust me, officer, I am *fully committed* to resolving this impasse. This isn't some *side gig* for me."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. Tell me about this alleged d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. Tell me about this alleged drug trafficking."
fields.Alternate1: "Tell me again about this drug trafficking."
fields.Alternate2: "I've changed my mind about the drug trafficking case."
fields.Alternate3: "Tell me again about this drug trafficking."

fields.Title: You: ""It's no coincidence the lorries ar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's no coincidence the lorries are stranded there like that, is it?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'll be explicit: if you find this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll be explicit: if you find this driver, I will share company secrets with you."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Precisely. Smuggled out of that ve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Precisely. Smuggled out of that very gate at night, most likely. Then loaded onto lorries and driven to Jamrock. You simply need to find *one* driver who'll open up to you."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A lot of it," she nods. "It comes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A lot of it," she nods. "It comes in from large Samaran factories. In South Safre, Siigay and Hsin-Yao. The literage they must get from this terminal alone must be *oceanic*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She simply nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: She simply nods.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It doesn't really matter -- and I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It doesn't really matter -- and I do apologize for the surveillance. Wild Pines can't afford to be blind at a time like this."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "It's implied she's open to discussi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's implied she's open to discussing this matter with you at a later occasion.

fields.Title: Empathy: "She *wants* to answer the question...."
fields.Dialogue Text: She *wants* to answer the question. Protocol keeps her from it.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "While dull orange pearls hang from..."
fields.Dialogue Text: While dull orange pearls hang from her ear lobes, red from cold. Her light green eyes scan you, full of knowledge -- and worry. Wealth and all its possibilities.

fields.Title: You: "Yes. I should make my own god damn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. I should make my own god damn money by now.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm sorry, I couldn't hear you," s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sorry, I couldn't hear you," she chuckles to herself. "The wind is a bit strong, could you repeat that?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's all right, lieutenant." The w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's all right, lieutenant." The woman dips her fingers back into the bag. "I really did bring as little cash with me as possible, to avoid attention. So here you are -- the last bit of filthy *lucre* I can share."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She removes a few notes and hands t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She removes a few notes and hands them to you. The paper is cold and oily to the touch.

fields.Title: You: ""I want to talk about something els..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I want to talk about something else now."

fields.Title: You: ""I came upon a few hidden maps illu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I came upon a few hidden maps illustrating the range of the smuggling network."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Well, he sounds *very* dangerous...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, he sounds *very* dangerous. I urge you to take care, officer. I wouldn't want anything to happen to you. Not with what's coming..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*Powerful*...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Powerful*..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You're back. Good." She takes a si..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're back. Good." She takes a sip from her silvery thermal cup. "What can I help you with?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The point of the presentation is -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The point of the presentation is -- these kinds of things *happen* around the Claires. Watch out when you're dealing with him."
